All-you-can-eat tasty buffet breakfast, unlimited Wi-Fi access and many more extras that don't cost a plus: hospitality corner, special family offers and more.accorhotels.com

name: Achat Hotel Budapest
description: ACHAT Hotel Budapest is located on the Hungária körút ring road, next to the Puskas Ferenc Stadium and its M2 metro stop. Each room in the property features stylish, modern furniture, air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi, a minibar, a safety deposit box and tea and coffee making facilities. The Bistrorante Restaurant serves Hungarian and international cuisine. Computer with Internet connection and a printer are available in the lobby of ACHAT Hotel Budapest. The Papp László Sportarena is 1 km away, while the Hungexpo Exhibition Centre is 2.5 km from the premises. Private parking is possible on site.

name: Verdi Grand Hotel
description: Attractively situated in Budapest, Akeah Verdi Budapest features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box, while certain rooms have a balcony. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Akeah Verdi Budapest. Hungarian National Museum is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 11 km from Akeah Verdi Budapest, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Corinthia Budapest
description: Standing proudly at the heart of grand Budapest, Corinthia occupies a legendary space in Budapest hospitality. Inside walls which have been standing since the late 1800s lies an elegant homage to modern luxury, with a respectful nod to the past round every corner. It is your ideal base from which to explore, with landmarks like Heroes’ Square, Buda Castle and the thermal waters of Széchenyi Baths within easy reach. A warm Corinthia welcome awaits after a day of exploring; sink into the Royal Spa, an art deco masterpiece where modern comforts sit alongside original features, before discovering an unrivalled collection of restaurants and bars including Caviar & Bull, Uncensored and Rickshaw. That’s if you can bear to leave your room of course… each of our accommodations is equipped with every luxury for an unforgettable stay. From the nearby underground and tram stops, guests can easily access all attractions. The Hungexpo Exhibition Centre is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Anantara New York Palace Budapest
description: The 5* Anantara New York Palace Budapest Hotel is situated on Erzsébet Körút boulevard. Conveniently close to the Madach Theatre, Hungarian State Opera House and the famed Chain Bridge. The Blaha Lujza underground station is a short walk away and Budapest Airport can be reached by car in 30 minutes. The building spans seven floors filled with 185 rooms, where tea and coffee facilities, large flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi come as standard. A range of rooms and suites are available with sweeping views over the city. Guests can choose from the hotel’s two restaurants, the New York Café and the Salon Restaurant or a bar menu at the Nyugat Bar. The hotel’s spa and gym offer guests the chance to relax and rejuvenate away from the city.NH Hoteles

name: Lions Garden Hotel
description: Featuring a free spa area and a restaurant, the boutique-style Lion's Garden Hotel is located in Budapest, 150 metres from the City Park. The new Museum of Ethnography, the House of Hungarian Music and the Heroe Square at the end of the Andrassy Avenue are in walking distance. Keleti Railway Station and the NEW Puskás Ferenc Stadium are both within 800 metres, while the Papp László Sports Arena and Arena Plaza are within 1.5 km from the property. The hotel is located in the diplomatic quarter, close to many embassies and faces to the 100-year-old Dominican Church. The spa facilities including a swimming pool, a hot tub and a sauna, are available free of charge (different opening hours!). Massage can be booked with the property for a surcharge. On the 6th floor we offer our NEW room type; DELUXE double room with balcony and shower.

name: Danubius Hotel Hungaria City Center
description: The Hotel Hungaria City Center enjoys a central location, 300 metres from the Keleti railway station. Free WiFi is available in all areas of the hotel. All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a satellite TV. Most of the exquisitely furnished rooms and suites offer superb city views. A rich breakfast buffet is served upon request every morning and fine Hungarian and international cuisine is served in the restaurants. Beauty services are provided for relaxation after a rewarding day. Underground guarded parking for private cars in the Hotel Hungaria City Center's garage is also available for your convenience for a surcharge, upon previous reservation. Please note due to a limited capacity the parking spot in the garage needs to be booked in advance. The garage is open from 6 am. to 10 pm.

name: Novotel Budapest Danube
description: The four-star Novotel Budapest Danube hotel offers a fascinating view of the river Danube and the Hungarian Parliament, one of the most beautiful buildings in Central Europe. The hotel is located on the Buda side of the river, close to the Castle and the vivid downtown  and the Buda Castle. All the 175 spacious rooms  with calm atmosphere have free Wi-Fi, air-conditioning, laptop size safe, complimentary toiletries and coffee and tea making facilities.  Upgraded rooms with Danube view are available.accorhotels.com

name: House Beletage-Boutique Hotel
description: Located in the 8th district of Budapest, 500 metres from Kálvin Square, House Beletage-Boutique Hotel provides individually designed en-suite rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Air conditioning, iPhone docking station and a modern bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries, are standard facilities in all units. A small fridge and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels are also available in each room at Beletage House. Shuttle services to Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 18 km away, are offered at a surcharge. Various excursions and tickets can be booked for you at the reception desk. The popular Váci Street is 1.5 km from the Beletage, while Ráday Street, also offering a choice of restaurants, shops and bars, is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Radisson Blu Beke Hotel, Budapest
description: Situated 300 metres from the Nyugati Train Station and only 500 metres from the Andrássy Avenue. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. All rooms are air-conditioned and come with a desk and a satellite TV. The bathroom is fitted with a shower, while a hairdryer and free toiletries are provided. Some rooms also are equipped with bathtub. The property features sauna and a fitness center equipped with the latest technogy equipment. Oktogon Square with metro, bus and tram stops are only 500 metres away from the Radisson Blu Béke. The House of Terror museum is within 600 metres, while the State Opera House can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

name: The Hotel Unforgettable - Hotel Tiliana by Homoky Hotels & Spa
description: The perfect hotel for the full recreation and relaxation can be find only 15 minutes from the bustling everyday life of Budapest among the Buda Hills. The property went through full renovation and welcomes guests in a 4-star environment. The style of our hotel is unforgettable and it is unique in Budapest and surroundings of capital. We offer a modern and elegant rooms, our Etalon restaurant offers à la carte breakfast, local and international dishes, drink bar will be waiting for guests at late hours in the evening. Our large (2.5- hectare) park with trees is waiting for our kind smaller guests with lot of playgrounds, outside swimmingpool as weel as several surprises. We will make for childrens their holiday unforgettable.

name: Danubius Hotel Arena
description: The Danubius Hotel Arena is neighbouring the Laszlo Papp Sport Arena, the SYMA convention center and the famous Puskás Ferenc Stadium. Due to the short distance from the Puskás Ferenc Stadion M2 subway station, every point and train station of the city can be reached within a few minutes. There are parking facilities in front of the hotel both for cars and buses. You can choose from numerous recently refurbished rooms, make use of impressive fitness and conference facilities and plunge into the on-site pool. The newly renovated Oregano restaurant offers you delicious Hungarian and international cuisine. The helpful and friendly staff is always ready to provide you with any information you may need. The city centre is accessible by subway within a 10-minute ride.

name: Expo Congress Hotel
description: Featuring a free sauna and a free fitness centre, the pet-friendly ExpoCongress Hotel, next to the Hungexpo / Budapest Exhibition Centre, is situated in the green belt of Budapest. Free WiFi access is available and free public parking is possible on site. Guests can use the property’s business centre free of charge while meeting and banquet facilities are available for an additional fee. Each unit comes with a telephone and a TV, while the bathroom is fitted with a shower or a bath. The hotel also provides 24-hour reception services. Guests can store their luggage at the property free of charge and use cleaning services such as shoeshine and ironing service. Laundry service is available for an additional fee. Airport shuttle is available for a surcharge. The Kincsem park horse-riding centre, a popular venue for concerts and outdoor events, is less than 300 m away from the Expo Congress Hotel. The Pillangó Utca stop of metro line M2 is within 20 minutes on foot.

name: City Hotel Budapest
description: City Hotel Budapest is 400 meters from the Opera and a 5-minute walk from Oktogon Metro Station. It offers free internet throughout the hotel. The guest rooms at the City Hotel Budapest are decorated in warm colours and include a flat-screen TV, a work desk and a private bathroom. Continental breakfast is available on request and several restaurants and cafés are in the immediate vicinity. There is also a spacious outdoor terrace. The reception and the lobby bar are available 24 hours a day.

name: ibis Budapest City
description: The Ibis Budapest City hotel is located in the centre of Budapest in the business district with easy access to cheap public transport, railway stations and tourist attractions. The airport is 11.8 miles away and the Budapest Convention Centre is 3.1 miles away. It has 84 air-conditioned rooms, including 2 for disabled guests. The bar is open 24/24 and provides snacks. The hotel has indoor pay parking and free Wi-Fi access. There are restaurants close by. Excellent for business and leisure travelers.accorhotels.com

name: Boutique Hotel Victoria Budapest
description: Set by the foot of the Buda Castle, directly on the Danube River bank, this boutique hotel enjoys an elevated location in the heart of Budapest. It offers rooms with free WiFi and views of the Danube and the Parliament. The modern rooms are fitted with air conditioning, an LCD TV and satellite channels and a private bathroom. The facilities also include a safety box. You can relax in the sauna and enjoy massage services on request. The front desk at Boutique Hotel Victoria Budapest is at your service 24-hours a day. Breakfast is served in the main building. You can cross the Danube on the Chain Bridge 250 metres away. Margaret Island and the Mathias Church are both reachable within a few minutes’ walk. The Batthyányi Square metro station on line M2 is 500 metres from Boutique Hotel Victoria Budapest. Private parking is possible at a location nearby at an additional fee.

name: Hotel Bristol Budapest
description: Enjoying a quiet location close to the Arena Plaza shopping and entertainment centre, Hotel Bristol Budapest offers free Wi-Fi. All the historic sights of Budapest are easily reachable by tram, bus (200 metres) or subway (900 metres). Theatres, cinemas, restaurants and cafés are situated within walking distance. Hotel Bristol Budapest features nicely furnished and fully equipped non-smoking rooms including one room for disabled guests.The three banquet rooms are suitable for small events. The glass-covered breakfast area on the ground floor offers a wide range of breakfast items in buffet style. In the stylish bar you can select from a wide range of beverages and snacks.

name: Hotel Orion Várkert
description: The centrally located small and charming Hotel Orion Várkert can be found in a quiet street on the Buda side of the famous Elisabeth Bridge, just one block away from the Danube riverbank and 300 metres from the Castle Garden Bazaar. The bustling, historic city centre of Budapest, the Citadel and all other major sights are within easy reach, many of them within walking distance. Choose from nicely furnished, air-conditioned rooms featuring free wireless internet access. The Orion Várkert's sauna and fitness facilities are at your disposal free of charge. Traditional thermal baths as well as jogging paths in parks you can find within easy walking distance. Restaurants for lunch and dinner can be recommended at the reception. The hotel's modern lobby and its bar invites you to relax after a day of doing business or sightseeing. The Keleti Train Station is 6 km from the Orion. Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport can be reached within 25 km. Airport pick-up service is available against a surcharge.

name: Callas House
description: Located right next to the State Opera House in Budapest, Callas House features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. Every room has a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area where you can relax. All rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. St. Stephen's Basilica is 400 metres from Callas House, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 700 metres from the property. The Opera Station on metro line M1 can be reached in just 30 metres. The nearest airport is Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 20 km from the property.

name: Estilo Fashion Hotel Budapest
description: This elegant pet-friendly design hotel is located on Vaci Street, Budapest's pedestrian shopping street, 50 m from the Danube River and 100 m from the Great Market Hall. It offers free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a 24-hour business centre with computers. Guests can use the banquet facilities for an additional fee. Secured parking is available for a surcharge. The lounge is decorated with wooden elements, sleek furniture and pastel colours. During the day guests are served with tea and biscuits. The soundproofed rooms are fitted with custom-designed furniture and have air conditioning. The bathrooms have bathtub or shower and they provide free toiletries. On request, in-room baby amenities, such as a baby cot or a changing table can also be arranged. Guests can store their luggage at the property free of charge and use cleaning services such as shoeshine. Ironing and laundry services are available for an additional fee. Airport shuttle is available for a surcharge. Estilo Fashion Hotel Budapest is 700 m away from the Gellért Thermal Baths, while the nearest metro station is at Fővám Tér, 200 m away. Keleti Railway Station is 3 km from the property, while Liszt Ferenc International Airport is 17 km from the Estilo. Shuttle can be organised upon request and for surcharge.

name: Four Seasons Gresham Palace
description: Built in 1906 and entirely renovated in 2004, Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace Budapest enjoys an incomparable location in front of the Chain Bridge, offering luxury units, an infinity-edge pool, a fitness room and a restaurant and bar. All rooms and spacious suites offer iPod Docking Station, satellite TV, wired and wireless internet connection and marble-covered bathrooms with a spacious bath or a shower cabin. Most of the suites are provided with a further guest bathroom and some of the rooms also feature a step-out balcony with panoramic views of the Danube River and the Castle Hill. Guests can enjoy dinner or have a drink at the Kollázs Brasserie & Bar, a contemporary European brasserie overlooking the Chain Bridge and the Danube River, which offers creative combinations of the dining experience. Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning on continental basis. Additionally, American breakfast can be requested at an extra cost. The business centre and concierge desk are at your disposal with working stations, a boardroom and scanning and printing facilities. Translating and secretarial services are on request. The Buda Castle and the Matthias Church can be reached within a 15-minute walk, while the St. Stephen's Basilica is just 400 metres from the Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace. Private parking is possible on site and airport shuttle service can be arranged as well.

name: The Three Corners Hotel Art
description: This 3-star hotel, renovated in 2019, is located on a pedestrian street, next to the Kalvin Square metro, bus and tram stop, only 200 metres from the National Museum. WiFi internet and sauna are available for free. All rooms feature flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. Apartments feature 1 or 2 bedrooms, and a living room. Guests are served with a complimentary cup of coffee in the lounge. The buffet style breakfast is served every morning in the dining area on the ground floor. The famous Váci utca shopping street is only a 5-minute walk away from the Hotel Art Superior. You can reach the Great Market Hall within 350 metres. Metro lines M3 and M4 at the Kálvin Tér station can be reached in 220 metres. Covered private parking is possible in a walking distance from the hotel, for a surcharge. The Front Office service is available between 6:00 AM and 10:00 PM. In case your arrival time to the hotel is different than this time frame, please let us know.

name: Hotel Vision
description: Located in Budapest and with Hungarian National Museum reachable within 1.1 km, Hotel Vision provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 1.5 km from Gellért Hill. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. At Hotel Vision each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property. The accommodation offers a sauna. Popular points of interest near Hotel Vision include Dohany Street Synagogue, Blaha Lujza Square and Budapest History Museum. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Prater Residence
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a Smart TV. Other amenities include towels, an electric kettle, kitchenware and utensils, and a toaster.Expedia

name: B&b Hotel Budapest City
description: In a prime location in the centre of Budapest, B&B Hotel Budapest City provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Private parking is available on site. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. All guest rooms include a desk. A continental breakfast is available daily at B&B Hotel Budapest City. Hungarian National Museum is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 12 km from B&B Hotel Budapest City.

name: Hotel Mika Downtown
description: Hotel Mika is located in the historical Jewish quarter in the centre of Budapest, 450 metres from State Opera House. Dohany Street Synagogue is 500 metres from the property. Private parking is available 100 metres away, while free WiFi is provided. Every room is equipped with a refrigerator, an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units also feature a seating area, while the apartments also have a kitchen with an oven and microwave. Each unit is equipped with a fridge. Each unit is equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Bed linen is available. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. There are several restaurants, pubs and cafés in the immediate vicinity of the property. Conference facilities can be used for an additional fee. A spa and wellness centre as well as a gym can be reached in 100 metres. St. Stephen's Basilica is 750 metres from Hotel Mika, while Hungarian National Museum is 1.1 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 20 km from Hotel Mika.

name: Hotel Bara Budapest
description: Located in the green part of Buda at the foot of the Gellért hill next to the Citadella and Buda Castle, this hotel offers easy access to the centre, with the bus stop just 50 metres away. All rooms at the Hotel Bara Budapest have a private bathroom, a satellite TV and a refrigerator. Hungarian and international cuisine is served in the restaurant. Sightseeing tours, folklore evenings, boat tours, a Danube Bend (Dunakanyar) tour, and visits to a Puszta horse show can be organised on request. Garage parking is available on site at an additional cost.

name: Kvihotel Budapest
description: Situated in Budapest, Pest region, KViHotel Budapest - the smart hotel is set 400 metres from Dohany Street Synagogue. The property is located 700 metres from State Opera House, a 10-minute walk from Hungarian National Museum and an 11-minute walk from St. Stephen's Basilica. The rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. At the hotel, each room includes a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, while some rooms will provide you with a seating area. The rooms have a wardrobe. KViHotel Budapest - the smart hotel is a smart hotel, and everything is digitalized. Check-in happens through their own application: guests can choose their own rooms and use their smartphones as the room key. Great Market Hall is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Chain Bridge is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Ensana Thermal Margaret Island
description: Uniquely situated on the quiet and green Margaret Island in the heart of Budapest, the modern Ensana Thermal Margaret Island offers free use of its large spa area, an indoor and an outdoor pool, and free WiFi access. The spa area also includes a fitness centre, and various beauty treatments and massages are offered. In the Platán restaurant with its terrace, you can enjoy gourmet and light cuisine together with magnificent views of the park. The Boróka Bar with a terrace and the Neptun bar at the swimming pool are inviting places to relax. All rooms are air-conditioned and have a balcony. A work desk, satellite TV and bathrobes are also provided.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Budapest City Center
description: Immerse yourself in the old world charm of the Hungarian capital while enjoying the contemporary comforts of Ramada by Wyndham Budapest City Center. Just 21 kilometers from Budapest Airport with easy access to public transportation, our non smoking hotel is conveniently situated in the central 5th District, minutes from attractions like Buda Castle, St. Stephens Basilica, and the Hungarian Parliament Building. Take a boat cruise along the breathtaking Danube River or peruse the stores on Fashion Street, both within walking distance.Wyndham

name: Green Hotel Budapest
description: Only steps away from the Puskás Ferenc Stadion M2 Metro Station, this unique 4-star design hotel is next to the Hungexpo, the BOK Exhibition Hall, and the Papp Arena. Free Wi-Fi is available. The spacious, individually designed rooms at Green Hotel Budapest feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a small fridge, and a bathroom with hairdryer. In some rooms, air conditioning is available on request. The Green Hotel’s restaurant serves Hungarian and international cuisine. In the warmer months, guests can dine on the courtyard terrace. There is also a bar and a 24-hour front desk.

name: Hotel Mediterran
description: Offering a privileged central spot, this charming property blends a range of impressive facilities with easy access to a range of attractions. Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. Embrace the proximity to the excellent transport network and utilise it as an ideal base for accessing the business district and the range of attractions.

name: Hotel Museum Budapest
description: The Hotel Museum Budapest is situated in the heart of the city, close to National Museum and just a few steps from Váci street, the St. Steven’s Basilica and the Jewish Synagogue. All rooms include a safe, a minibar and a TV with satellite channels. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. A buffet breakfast is available. The hotel's lobby bar serves a wide selection of cocktails and wines. Sauna, hot tub, Turkish bath and a fitness room are available. Access to the wellness centre is included in the accommodation price.

name: K+K Hotel Opera Budapest
description: Located in Budapest, K+K Hotel Opera provides modern 4-star accommodation, as well as free Wi-Fi and a Finnish sauna. This luxury hotel is set in the heart of the city. There are a variety of amenities at K+K Hotel Opera on offer to guests, including a business centre with free internet access, massage services and a gym. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They provide a private bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. K+K Hotel Opera is located in the heart of Budapest’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport can be accessed via the hotel's shuttle service in under 30 minutes.Revato

name: Noble Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
description: Boasting a bar, Noble Boutique Hotel - Adults Only is set in the centre of Budapest, 1.2 km from Blaha Lujza Square. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Noble Boutique Hotel - Adults Only the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Hungarian National Museum, Dohany Street Synagogue and Hungarian State Opera. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 13 km from Noble Boutique Hotel - Adults Only.

name: Ensana Grand Margaret Island
description: Built in 1873 on the lush green and quiet Margaret Island in the centre of Budapest, the Ensana Grand Margaret Island offers a spacious spa area with a selection of treatments. A heated underground corridor connects the hotel to the neighbouring Ensana Thermal Margaret Island, which features one of Europe's top health spas. A hot tub, 2 pools, and various saunas and beauty treatments can be enjoyed there. The diagnostic section features various therapeutic treatments. Guests can access the spa area free of charge. The Széchenyi Restaurant offers fine dining with magnificent views of the park. International, domestic and diet cuisine, with a wide selection of Hungary's best wines, are served. Outdoor dining can be enjoyed in summer on the terrace and in the garden. In the evenings, a gypsy orchestra provides entertainment. The classically furnished rooms overlook the Danube or the magnificent park. They are all air-conditioned and have a minibar. The island stretches over 4 km and is protected leafy botanical parkland with ancient trees, a Japanese garden, and a rose garden, an open-air amphitheatre, traversed by walking and jogging tracks. Bicycles, horses, carts and electric buggies can be hired to get around. It is only a 15-minute drive away from the centre of Budapest.

name: Millennium Court, Budapest - Marriott Executive Apartments
description: Experience the beauty and history of Budapest city center with a stay at our apartment hotel, located perfectly just steps away from the main shopping area, Váci street. Marriott Executive Apartments are within walking distance of countless sights to see and do here in Hungary's vibrant capital. Choose from 66 one-bedroom, 33 two-bedroom, or 9 spacious studio apartments, all with full kitchen, flat-screen TV, a well-lit workspace and plush bedding. Apartments sizes vary between 50 and 75sqm (538 and 807sqft). Stay focused while you are enjoying our on-site hotel gym, or take advantage of our meeting rooms for up to 50 guests. Optional Continental breakfast is served at the Breakfast Lounge located on the 2nd floor. Whatever brings you here to Hungary, we know you'll feel at home at the Millennium Court, Budapest - Marriott Executive Apartments.Marriott

name: Hotel Molnár
description: Hotel Molnár's two neighbouring buildings are located in a quiet and green area of Budapest, 10 minutes by car from the centre. It offers free parking and a fitness area. Some rooms at Hotel Molnár are air-conditioned and have a balcony. They all feature satellite TV. There is also a charming garden with a swing for children. Sauna is also available for a surcharge.

name: Smart Hotel Budapest
description: Set in Budapest and with House of Terror reachable within 700 metres, Smart Hotel Budapest offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 1.5 km from Hungarian State Opera, 2 km from Dohany Street Synagogue and 2.8 km from St. Stephen's Basilica. The property is 1.2 km from Heroes' Square, and within 2 km of the city centre. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms come with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, while selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette equipped with a microwave. At Smart Hotel Budapest each room has bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Smart Hotel Budapest offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, Blaha Lujza Square and Keleti Railway Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from Smart Hotel Budapest, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Leonardo Hotel Budapest
description: Located in the Ferencvaros business district, the Leonardo Hotel Budapest is only 3-metro stops away from the very centre of Budapest. It offers an on-site restaurant, a bistro and free Wi-Fi. The en-suite rooms at the Leonardo Hotel are equipped with air conditioning, safes and satellite LCD TV as well as work desks and mini-fridges. Complimentary mineral water is offered in the room upon arrival. Guests can spend their time in the gym of the hotel. The restaurant and bar serve international and national cuisine. The Hummus Bar & Bistro serves Middle Eastern specialties and Hungarian dishes. In the summer months guests can also dine on the summer terrace.

name: Baross City Hotel
description: Only 50 metres from Keleti Railway Station, Baross offers modern accommodation in a period building with an inner courtyard. Keleti Underground (line M2 and M4) as well as tram and bus stops provide direct links to the Danube River banks and the city's main sights. Staff at the Baross City Hotel – Budapest can help guests find their way around town, as well as give suggestions on local cuisine and attractions. They are available around the clock and are praised for their friendliness. Spacious guestrooms come with air-conditioning and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. All rooms include a private bathroom with a bath or shower, and most overlook the quiet courtyard. Baross City is less than a 10-minute walk from the popular Heroes’ Square and City Park. It is also adjacent to the local bus n.7 stop, which provides transport to Buda. WiFi access is free and a bicycle rack on the ground floor is available.

name: The Three Corners Lifestyle Hotel
description: The brand new The Three Corners Lifestyle Hotel is located in the centre of Budapest, 700 metres from Great Market Hall and boasts a terrace and sauna. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and paid private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units feature a seating area for your convenience. Some rooms have views of the garden or city. All rooms include a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Various cardio training machines, including treadmill, elliptical trainer and exercise bike, are available in every room type free of charge upon availability and upon previous request. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The property is located 100 metres from the amazing and famous Raday street with its cozy terraces and restaurants. Hungarian National Museum is 800 metres from The Three Corners Lifestyle Hotel, while Gellért Thermal Baths is 1.2 km from the property. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 16 km away.

name: Novotel Budapest Centrum
description: With a stay at Novotel Budapest Centrum, you'll be centrally located in Budapest, within a 10-minute drive of Hungarian State Opera House and St. Stephen's Basilica. Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Moments Budapest
description: Hotel Moments Budapest offers stylish rooms, wellness facilities and an on-site restaurant which serves the breakfast for our hotel guests. The hotel is located on the iconic Andrássy Avenue of Budapest. The State Opera House is 200 metres from the property. Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Each room comes with a private bathroom and exclusive bathroom amenities. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. The St. Stephen's Basilica is a 3-minute walk from the Hotel Moments Budapest. The Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 17 km from the property. Shuttle service is available for a surcharge.

name: ibis Budapest Castle Hill
description: Ibis Budapest Castle Hill awaits you with recently renovated modern guest rooms and common areas. This great value hotel is next to the Buda Castle Hill and in a great location close to shopping areas, restaurants and only 10 minutes by public transportation from the city center.accorhotels.com

name: Corvin Hotel Budapest - Sissi wing
description: Built in modern-eclectic style, Corvin Hotel Budapest Sissi Wing enjoys a quiet location 300 metres from the Grand Boulevard of Budapest and the Corvin-negyed M3 Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi connection. All rooms in the Corvin Hotel Budapest Sissi Wing are non-smoking and feature satellite TV and a a safety box. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub or a shower cabin and equipped with a hairdryer. Guests can easily reach the River Danube in a 10-minute walk or the National Theatre by taking the HÉV Suburban-railway 750 metres away. Private parking is possible on site at an additional cost.

name: ibis Budapest Centrum
description: ibis Budapest Centrum hotel is located in the center of the financial, cultural and commercial district of Budapest. Our 126 recently refurbished modern and fresh air-conditioned rooms, including 1 for disabled guests, are ideal for business or leisure travelers, as it is within easy access by public transport and by car. Restaurants, shopping centers and sightseeing buses are immediately close by. The hotel has indoor parking and free WIFI access. We look forward to welcome you in our hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton Garden Inn Budapest City Centre
description: Welcome to Hilton Garden Inn Budapest City Centre, a tranquil hotel located in a side street of downtown Budapest. We are walking distance from the famous Andrassy shopping street, restaurants, coffee shops and all major sights, including Hungarian State Opera House, St. Stephen's Basilica, Hungarian Parliament and Chain Bridge. Stay in comfort in one of the modern guest rooms and suites with home-like amenities such as complimentary WiFi, a 40-inch HDTV and a mini-refrigerator. Select a spacious suite boasting a balcony with beautiful panoramic city views, some overlooking the Basilica. Accessible rooms are also available with all the standard amenities plus a few extras for your convenience. Enjoy local specialties in our Garden Grille restaurant or stop by the 24-hour Shop. Stay active in the fitness center. For small meetings and events we offer a 1,156 sq. m. conference room divisible into two.Hilton

name: Hotel Gozsdu Court
description: Just a 1-minute walk from the Deák Ferenc Square in the centre of Budapest, Hotel Gozsdu Court offers fully equipped apartments with free WiFi. Set in a renovated 19th-century building in eclectic style, it is 200 metres from the Opera House and the Andrassy Avenue. All apartments come with a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a modern kitchen. The court are situated in different buildings in the same complex. Rich hot and cold buffet breakfast is available in the restaurant and the hotel's own club lounge offers many exclusive benefits. At a surcharge, guests and kids can relax at the spa and wellness centre or workout in a gym on site. Hotel Gozsdu Court' s front desk is at guests' service 24 hours a day and the building complex offers unlimited number of parking places. Parking is available 150 meters from the hotel for an extra fee.

name: 12 Revay Hotel
description: Centrally located in Budapest, 12 Revay Hotel offers an on-site bar, 270 metres from the St. Stephen's Basilica. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. Each air-conditioned unit boasts modern furnishing and equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The apartments feature a well-equipped kitchenette for your convenience and they have a terrace with direct views of the Basilica. The bathrooms are fitted with a shower and include free toiletries and a hairdryer. The reception is at your disposal in 24 hours a day. Shuttle service and airport transfer are available on request and at an additional cost. The State Opera House can be reached within 200 metres from the 12 Revay Hotel. The Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 17 km from the property.

name: Hotel Charles
description: The friendly Charles hotel is situated 1.5 km from the city centre, yet with bus stops right before the door, and offers you spacious rooms with kitchenette and a great restaurant. Start your day at the rich breakfast buffet before you set out to explore the impressive Hungarian capital or for successfully doing business. In the renowned Janos hotel restaurant you can experience tasty traditional Hungarian cuisine. The helpful staff is always there to provide you with any information you may need to spend a rewarding stay in Budapest. Many major sights can be reached within a few minutes. The public bus takes guests right down to the famous Vaci street in the heart of Budapest (only 2 stops). The hotel is situated on the Buda side, only a few minutes’ walk away from Gellert Hill and not far from Castle Hill. The Keleti Train Station is to be found 4 km from the hotel, reachable easily via a bus.

name: Ibis Budapest Heroes Square
description: ibis Heroes Square welcomes guests in the cultural heart of Budapest, next to the City Park with excellent public transport connections to the city centre (Metro station: Hösök tere) and with hotel garage. The latest ibis designed public area is enhanced by its immediate proximity to the Museum of Fine Arts, Hungarian Art Gallery, Széchenyi Thermal Bath, Zoo, Heroes Square and the National Opera House. The hotel has air-cooling system, free Wi-Fi and exceptionally comfortable beds in spacious rooms.accorhotels.com

name: Promenade City Hotel
description: Promenade City Hotel is situated right in the city centre of Budapest, on the pedestrianized Váci Street next to the Danube River. It offers free Wi-Fi and a breakfast buffet. Within a 10-minute walk you can reach the UNESCO-protected Andrassy Street. The Ferenciek tere and Vorosmarty Square Metro Station is only 300 metres away from the Promenade City Hotel. All rooms of the Promenade City Hotel are equipped with an LCD TV and international channels, air conditioning, electronic door locks and soundproof windows. The property also offers 24-hour reception services. Fancy shops and boutiques, luxurious restaurants and elegant bars can be found only a few steps from the Promenade City Hotel, offering plenty of opportunities for entertainment all day and night.

name: Hotel Nap
description: The Nap hotel is only 15 minutes by public transport away from the airport and the city centre and it is conveniently located for visitors of the Budapest Fair Centre (2 km). Choose from charmingly decorated and well-equipped rooms, indulge in a massage or in a treatment in the beauty parlour. A separate conference room with a terrace is available for business and private events, which can be organised at very reasonable rates. The Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport and the Puskás Ferenc Stadium are reachable within 15 minutes. The Árkád Shopping Centre can be reached in 10 minutes from the Nap hotel.

name: Opera Garden Hotel & Apartments
description: The Opera Garden Hotel & Apartments is located in a pedestrian street in the heart of Budapest, just a few blocks away from the Opera House and Andrássy Street and it offers homemade products for breakfast and a rooftop terrace with a garden, overlooking the Basilica. WiFi is available in all areas for free. All rooms and apartments are sound proofed and feature a fully equipped kitchen, a 101-cm LCD TV and free wireless internet access. Beds are equipped with 22 cm comfort-foam mattresses. The bathrooms are provided with L’occitane toiletries. Art Cool air conditioning is available in each unit. The wellness and fitness area with a sauna, a treadmill and an ergometer invites you to unwind after a day of doing business or sightseeing in Budapest. The hotel provides complimentary sangria to every guest. A free giveaway is offered to guests at the property. There are many restaurants and design shops around the Opera Garden Hotel and Apartments.

name: Roombach Hotel Budapest Center
description: Opened in April 2014, Roombach Hotel Budapest Center is located in Budapest and offers a 24-hour front desk, a lounge with a snack bar, and en-suite rooms with free air conditioning and a flat-screen smart TV. Free Wi-Fi is available. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some of the rooms have views of the courtyard. Extras include a laptop safe. Breakfast is available every morning. At Roombach Hotel Budapest Center guests will find a ticket service, a tour desk and luggage storage. The Gosdu Court with several restaurants, bars and pubs is just 50 metres from the hotel. Only 230 metres from the hotel, guests will find an underground station (line 1, 2, and 3). The Deák Ferenc Square is 300 metres away, and the Vaci Street as well as the Chain Bridge are both within 1 km of the hotel. Keleti Railway Station is 2 km from the hotel. The Nepliget International Bus Station is 4.3 km and the Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 17 km away.

name: Andrassy Thai Hotel
description: In a 19th-century palace right on Andrássy Avenue in the centre of Budapest, Andrassy Thai Hotel features a 24-hour reception, a Thai- and classically styled rooms and free WiFi access. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms are furnished in a Thai or Hungarian style. They feature a balcony overlooking the city, a seating area, a minibar, a flat-screen cable TV, and a bathroom. The Bajcsy-Zsilinszky út Metro Station is right outside the Thai Andrassy Hotel, and the Deák Ferenc tér Metro Station can be reached in a 2-minute walk. St. Stephen’s Basilica is just around the corner, and the Chain Bridge and Danube River are 400 metres away.

name: Gold Hotel & Apartments
description: Located in Budapest, Gold Apartments offers free Wi-Fi and private balconies. It is a 15-minute walk from Buda Castle and Gellert Hill. All apartments of Gold Apartments provide 2 bedrooms, bathroom amenities, a hairdryer, safe and a LCD TV. Each apartment has a kitchen with a refrigerator, a coffee machine, a dining area and storage space. Guests of the Gold Apartments can make use of the services offered by the partner hotel nearby as the conference room, 24-hour reception, laundry, breakfast buffet, parking, car rental and sight seeing tours. The nearest bus stop is 100 meters from the property's entrance.

name: Cotton House Hotel Budapest
description: The Cotton House Hotel Budapest features interior design of 1920s. Nyugati Railway station is 200 metres away. Free WiFi, sauna and fitness center are offered. The rooms have a decoration of 1920s and 1930s, they also feature flat-screen TV, free toiletries and a minibar. They come with individually controlled heating and air conditioning. Some rooms offer a bath or a shower and some feature a spa bath. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, luggage storage, transfer service, fitness room and infra sauna. Buffet breakfast is served with international and local specialties. Guests can enjoy the Hotel Lobby Bar which offers refreshments, coffee specialties, selection of beer or wine. Hungarian State Opera 600 metres, while Budapest Operetta Theater is 500 metres away. The nearest airport, Budapest Liszt Ferenc International Ariport, is 17.4 km away.

name: Párisi Udvar Hotel Budapest, part of Hyatt
description: Set in Budapest, less than 1 km from Dohany Street Synagogue, Párisi Udvar Hotel Budapest, part of Hyatt offers accommodation featuring a fitness centre, wellness centre, private parking, bar and free WiFi. The property also offers 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, refrigerator, kettle, hairdryer and a desk. The units feature a private bathroom with a shower, bidet and free toiletries. The units also offer a terrace. Buffet breakfast is available at the property and an on-site restaurant is also available. Párisi Udvar Hotel Budapest, part of Hyatt offers a terrace and an airport shuttle service at an extra cost. Guests can enjoy hiking and cycling nearby. Cafés, shops and theatres are also available nearby. The non-smoking property is located 1.5 km from State Opera House. Chain Bridge is 1.6 km from the hotel, while St. Stephen's Basilica is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 21 km from Párisi Udvar Hotel Budapest, part of Hyatt, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Meininger Budapest Great Market Hall
description: Located less than 1 km from Hungarian National Museum, MEININGER Budapest Great Market Hall offers 3-star accommodation in Budapest and features a terrace. The property is close to several well-known attractions, an 11-minute walk from Great Market Hall, 1.4 km from Gellért Thermal Baths and 1.8 km from Dohany Street Synagogue. Chain Bridge is 2.6 km away. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. With a private bathroom, rooms at MEININGER Budapest Great Market Hall also provide guests with free WiFi. At the accommodation rooms include air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The reception can provide advice on the area in order to help guests plan their day. St. Stephen's Basilica is 2.9 km from MEININGER Budapest Great Market Hall. Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport is 20 km away.

name: Mercure Budapest Korona Hotel
description: Situated in the heart of the city,  Mercure Budapest Korona is suitable for both business and leisure travelers. Our well-equipped meeting rooms are ideal to host events up to 300 participants.  In our Winestone Restaurant you can taste unique local wines and authentic cuisine.  The hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with Wi-Fi access. Pamper yourself and pick one of our suites with Privilege services and stunning National Museum views.accorhotels.com

name: Eitans Guesthouse
description: No description found

name: Ibis Budapest Aero
description: ibis Budapest Citysouth is located between the airport and city centre (20 min) next to a shopping mall, opposite a metro station, offering easy access to the airport. Book one of our 139 recently refurbished A/C rooms including family rooms for up to 4 people. Our hotel offers you a unique community garden with terrace area, outdoor private car park, 24 hour bar offering homemade burgers till 10 pm, free WiFi, 66 m² / 710 ft² meeting room for seminars with direct garden access and catering possibilities.accorhotels.com

name: Sous44
description: SOUS44 is set in a historic building in Budapest and it offers accommodation and an inner courtyard with a terrace decorated by wrought-iron railings. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Each room at SOUS44 is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Several restaurants, bars and theatres can be reached in the immediate vicinity of the hotel. Dohany Street Synagogue is 800 metres from SOUS44, while Hungarian National Museum is 900 metres away. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Centrooms House
description: Centrooms House is located in one of the most trendy places in the centre, on Blaha Lujza Square. It offers recently refurbished rooms and free Wi-Fi in the entire hotel. All en-suite rooms provide satellite TV, an electronic safe and individually controlled heating and air conditioning. Many restaurants and shops, the Vaci Utca shopping street as well as the Jewish Museum can be found in the immediate vicinity of the Centrooms House.

name: Equity Point Budapest
description: The Equity Point Budapest housed in a renovated 19th-century building is located in the heart of Budapest, in the centre of Pest, close to many tourist attractions. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. You can choose from elegantly furnished and modernly equipped rooms, still reflecting the turn-of-the century atmosphere. The invitingly styled restaurant is a fine place to taste delicious Hungarian cuisine. All rooms are air conditioned. "Females only" rooms are also available. The property also offers a beer garden and a patio. Váci street, the Duna Corso, the Synagogue, the National Museum, the Covered Market Hall, the Opera and St. Stephan Cathedral are all easily accessible on foot.

name: Danubius Hotel Erzsébet City Center
description: Located in a pedestrian street with cafés and bars, Hotel Erzsebet City Center is only a few steps from the Vaci utca shopping street and the Great Market Hall. All rooms at the Erzsebet Hotel are air-conditioned and feature a minibar and satellite TV. The in-house MészárSteak Kitchen restaurant offers a steak menu and an á la carte menu. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site Judy's Wine Bar. The Ferenciek tere underground station is just 200 metres away.

name: Maverick Urban Lodge
description: Offering a 24-hour front desk, Maverick Urban Lodge is located in Budapest. Free WiFi access is available. Each room at Maverick Urban Lodge will provide you with air conditioning. Some rooms feature a private bathroom with a shower. You can enjoy city view from the room. Laundry facilities, ticket service and airport shuttle are offered at an additional cost. Many shops and restaurants are reachable within a short walk from the hostel. Great Market Hall can be reached within a 5-minute walk, while Gellért Thermal Baths can be found within 10 minutes on foot. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 16 km away.

name: Netizen Budapest Centre
description: Well situated in Budapest, NETIZEN Budapest Centre offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around 200 metres from Blaha Lujza Square, 1 km from Dohany Street Synagogue and less than 1 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the hostel every room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at NETIZEN Budapest Centre can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include House of Terror, Keleti Railway Station and Hungarian State Opera. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from NETIZEN Budapest Centre.

name: Easy Star Hotel
description: Easy Star Hotel is located in the heart of Budapest, in a quiet street off Andrássy avenue, just 100 metres from the next metro station. It offers a breakfast buffet. All en-suite rooms offer a range of facilities An internet terminal is at your disposal as well in the Easy Star Hotel. Within 50 metres away there is a supermarket.

name: Lidi Guesthouse
description: Lidi Guesthouse provides accommodation with free WiFithroughout the property in the centre of Budapest, 500 metres from Dohany Street Synagogue. The property is located 400 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica, 1 km from Hungarian National Museum and 1.7 km from Hungarian Parliament Building. The guest house features family rooms. The guest house offers certain rooms with city views, and each room has a kettle. Guest rooms include a shared bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen. Popular points of interest near Lidi Guesthouse include Hungarian State Opera, Blaha Lujza Square and House of Terror. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Budapest Griffin Guest House
description: Situated in the 05. Belváros - Lipótváros district in Budapest, 200 metres from Hungarian National Museum, Budapest Griffin Guest House features free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms have a seating area where you can relax. All rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a shared lounge at the property. Great Market Hall is 300 metres from Budapest Griffin Guest House, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 700 metres away. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Grand Richter Hotel
description: Grand Hotel Richter is conveniently located on the main street near the ‘Keleti’ railway station close to the city centre of Budapest. We offer some single and double rooms with double or twin beds. Our bright and airy rooms are all equipped with sound proof windows, TV-set, telephone, bathroom with shower and some have balconies with view onto the lush green courtyard below. We provide free closed parking in the garden. Our guests can have their drinks at the bar corner or on the terrace under an old and beautiful chestnut tree and enjoy a piece of serenity. Perfect for business travellers or tourists as we are within walking distance to the main tourist sites of Budapest (Hero’s’ Square, Museum of Fine Arts, Szechenyi Thermal Bath, Vajdahunyad Castle and the most famous and elegant restaurant in Budapest – the Gundel). You can reach the downtown in 10-15 minutes by the public transportation even during the night.

name: Hotel Foldana
description: Situated 1.7 km from Heroes' Square, Hotel Foldana offers 4-star accommodation in Budapest and has a bar. Featuring a terrace, this 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk. Hotel Foldana features some rooms that have a balcony, and every room comes with a coffee machine. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Foldana. Staff speak English and Hungarian at the reception. House of Terror is 3.6 km from the hotel, while Margaret Island Japanese Garden is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 15 km from Hotel Foldana.

name: City Hotel Matyas
description: City Hotel Matyas is located in the heart of Budapest, just 50 metres from Váci utca featuring exclusive shops and restaurants. Each room has a TV, work desk and free WiFi. Free toiletries can be requested at the reception. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk.

name: Sarokhaz Panzio
description: The Sarokház Panzió is only 5 minutes away from the Budapest Ferihegy Airport and features a tennis court on its own grounds and a large parking area, which is cheaper than the airport parking lots. You can choose from nicely furnished and air-conditioned rooms with balconies. The Gusto restaurant serves international and Hungarian specialities daily from 06:00 to 22:00. The wellness centre offers hot tub and infrared sauna facilities as well as massage treatments. For guests who want to leave their cars at the Sarokhaz guest house, an airport shuttle is available at an extra charge.

name: H2 Hotel Budapest
description: Thank you for choosing our Trademark Hotel Collection property. Enjoying a warm welcome. Savoring a perfect pour. Sinking into plush bedding. A serene stay with a Wyndham Hotel Group Property make up the moments that create memories to last a lifetime.Wyndham

name: Flow Spaces
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Budapest, Flow Spaces provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.7 km from Blaha Lujza Square, 1.8 km from St. Stephen's Basilica and 1.6 km from Citadella. The accommodation features karaoke and a shared kitchen. Guest rooms include bed linen. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Hungarian National Museum, Dohany Street Synagogue and Gellért Hill. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 13 km from Flow Spaces.

name: The Aquincum Hotel Budapest
description: The outstanding Aquincum Hotel Budapest - where inspiration meets tradition - is located in a prime area alongside the Danube on the Buda side of the city, facing Margaret Island. The Aquincum Hotel Budapest offers easy access to the city centre. The hotel is surrounded by medieval streets, wine bars, restaurants and its own green park. All bedrooms are air-conditioned and come with free wired and wireless internet access, and bathrobes in each bathroom. The Aquincum Hotel Budapest provides a fine restaurant which offers Hungarian and international cuisine, and a bar is also available. Aronia Wellness Centre & Spa offers relaxation in thermal pools, and a selection of unique treatments. The spa provides facilities such as an indoor pool, two thermal pools and saunas. Guests can also get active in the fitness room.

name: Star City Hotel
description: Star City Hotel is located 400 meters from both the neo-romantic City Park and the Keleti Train and Metro Station of Budapest. The hotel provides free WiFi throughout. Overlooking either the inner courtyard, or a quiet side-street, rooms at Star City Hotel are equipped with flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Air conditioning is standard and adjoining rooms are available upon request. Breakfast is served daily and an in-house bar is available for drinks and lattes. Staff can advise on nearby attractions and each guest receives a free welcome map of the city upon arrival. The elegant Andrassy Avenue is only a 10-minute walk from the Star City. The nearby metro stop gives direct access to Budapest city centre.

name: Casati Hotel - Adults Only
description: Housed in an 18th-century building, the adult-only Casati Budapest Hotel is a boutique hotel located in the historic Terézváros District of Budapest. The hotel won the Hungarian Hotel of the Year Award in the 3-star category in 2019. It features a landscaped courtyard and interiors decorated with original works of art. The rooms and suites at Casati Budapest Hotel are designed in 4 different themes: Classic, Cool, Natural and Heaven. Guests are greeted with a welcome drink and can choose the style of their room, which is subject to availability. Most of Budapest's main sights are situated within walking distance of the hotel - the Opera, the Saint Stephen's Basilica, the theatres of Pesti Broadway, the Andrássy street and the cafes and restaurants of the Liszt Ferenc Square. The city centre pedestrian areas and the business district can all be reached within a 5- to 10-minute walk.

name: Mp Hostel Budapest
description: MP Hostel Budapest is centrally located in Budapest, 350 metres from Blaha Lujza tér metro station. It offers rooms with private and shared facilities and a terrace. Guests use the onsite bicycle storage room. A bar is also available on site. The front desk is open 24 hours and features a luggage room. Guests can reach major sights, such as the National Museum or Budapest Great Synagogue within walking distance. Margaret Island is 3 km away.

name: Hotel Ferihegy
description: The Ferihegy hotel is located in quiet surroundings, a 10-minute drive from Budapest Airport. It offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms, free parking and a 24-hour reception. Breakfast is served every day from 7:00 to 10:00. You can have a relaxing drink at the well-stocked bar before spending a peaceful night's sleep in your room at the Hotel Ferihegy. The hotel offers airport transfers and long-term parking for an additional fee. Car hire can be arranged at the reception.

name: Budapest Ville Bed & Breakfast
description: Set in a historical building, Budapest Ville Bed & Breakfast is located in Budapest, close to the city centre. Free WiFi access is available. Both rooms at Budapest Ville Bed & Breakfast are designed in Vintage style. Featuring a bath tub or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safety deposit box is provided in each room. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and an ironing service. The property offers free parking. The bed and breakfast is 700 metres from Andrassy Avenue and 800 metres from Heroes' Square. Széchenyi Thermal Bath can be reached in 1.5 km, while the club area is within 1.2 km. Keleti Railway Station is 900 metres from the property, while Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 16 km away.

name: Pal's Hostel And Apartments
description: Offering tastefully furnished accommodation units in the very centre of Budapest, the pet-friendly Pal's Hostel and Apartments is situated right in front of the St. Stephen's Basilica. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Most of the rooms at Pal's offer views of the city and private bathroom, while some are provided with shared bathroom facilities. The studios and the apartments are fitted with a kitchen or a kitchenette for self-catering. A shared kitchen is also available for all guests, equipped with a toaster, a kettle, a microwave and a refrigerator. Towels and bed linen are provided. Airport shuttle and laundry service can be used for an additional fee. Guests can play board games and table football at Pal's Hostel. The State Opera House is 500 m from the property. The Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is located 17 km from the property. Airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.

name: Avenue Hostel
description: Opened in July 2014, Avenue Hostel is located directly at the Andrassy Avenue in the heart of Budapest. The hostel awaits guests with free WiFi, shared kitchens and a snack bar. Within 2 minutes on foot, an underground (line 1) and tram stop (lines 4, 6) can be reached. The bathrooms are for shared use and situated in the corridor, while some rooms are equipped with private bathrooms. The property’s front desk is staffed 24 hours a day and the building is equipped with a lift. Guests can reach the Nyugati Railway Station within 7 minutes on foot. The Danube is 1.5 km away and the Buda Castle is within 2 km.

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Budapest
description: Boasting a privileged spot and just a short stroll from the Danube, the Adina Apartment Hotel Budapest successfully combines style with ultimate comfort. Plunge into the cool of the expansive pool and get active in the compact gym which overlooks a large, leafy courtyard of the Adina Apartment Hotel. Each spacious, air-conditioned and fully serviced studio room and apartment has a large bedroom and a kitchen/kitchenette. The valet service can stock your fridge with groceries and drinks while food delivery from top restaurants is available as well. There is also a public guest laundry and an underground car park at the Adina Apartment Hotel Budapest.

name: Emerald Hotel
description: Attractively located in Budapest, Emerald Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom and coffee machine, while some rooms include a terrace and others also boast city views. The rooms have a desk. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. Emerald Hotel offers a sauna. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Dohany Street Synagogue, Hungarian State Opera and St. Stephen's Basilica. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from Emerald Hotel.

name: Adagio Hostel 2.0 Basilica
description: The Adagio Hostel 2.0 Basilica is set 500 metres from the St Stephen's Cathedral and 50 metres from the M1 Metro Line and it offers modernly furnished private and dormitory rooms. Free WiFi is available. The hostel provides a fully equipped shared kitchen for self-catering purposes. 24-hours reception and computers with internet connection are also featured in the Adagio Hostel 2.0 Basilica. Several pubs and restaurants can be found in the immediate vicinity. The Andrássy Avenue and the Deák Ferenc Square, transportation hub of 3 metro lines are within a 5-minute walk. Public parking is possible on site.

name: Made Inn Budapest
description: The modern Made Inn Budapest is located in the Gozsdu Court, right behind the Great Synagogue and a 5-minute walk from the Deák Ferenc Square. All apartments are soundproofed and feature free WiFi. Various bars are at the same building. All apartments come with a flat-screen TV and soundproofed windows.Hot and cold buffet breakfast is available in the restaurant and the hotel's own club lounge offers many exclusive benefits. Breakfast and other meals are available in the restaurant on the ground floor. The front desk is at your service 24 hours a day and the building complex offers unlimited number of parking places. At a surcharge, guests can relax at the spa and wellness centre or workout at the gym on site. Parking is available 150 meters from the hotel for an extra fee.

name: Central Hotel 21
description: The modern Central Hotel 21 and Apartments offers stylishly designed rooms and apartments in the centre of Budapest, close to the Market Hall, the Synagogue and the National Museum. Free WiFi access is available at the property. Accommodation units offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a uniquely designed bathroom with a hairdryer. The friendly staff of the reception is happy to provide you with any information you may need. At the reception wide range of tickets can be purchased. The Blaha Lujza tér Metro Station, Hungarian National Museum and Museum of Applied Arts are all within a 10-minute walk. The hotel does not accomodate stag /hen and party groups to protect our guest. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

name: Royal Park Boutique Hotel
description: Located a 10-minute walk from Budapest’s Andrassy Ut Boulevard, this boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free wired internet. Keleti Railway Station and the metro station are opposite the hotel. Opened in June 2010, Royal Park Boutique Hotel ‘s rooms are fitted with contemporary furnishings and bedding. Each room is air-conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe and a minibar. A rich breakfast buffet is served in the morning and the lobby awaits the guests with a café. The Budapest city centre with the St. Stephen's Basilica and the famous Parliament at the shores of the Danube can be reached within a 5-minute metro ride from Royal Park Boutique Hotel. Budapest International Airport (Ferihegy) can be reached within a 40-minute drive with a shuttle bus or a taxi. Guests arriving by car can park in the hotel’s own garage. Free access to Wi-Fi is available in the lobby.

name: City Hotel Ring
description: Located on Budapest's Grand Boulevard 250 metres from Nyugati Train Station, City Hotel Ring offers easy access on foot to sights like Hungarian Parliament Building, 800 metres away, as well as nightlife venues and the recreational area Margaret Island, reachable within 850 metres. After a night in your air-conditioned room you can start a day of sightseeing or business. The hotel was renovated in July 2017 and guests can enjoy a redesigned environment. Free WiFi is available in all the rooms. There is also a computer station with cable internet connection offered for free use at the lobby of the City Hotel Ring. Free toiletries can be requested at the reception. The next metro, bus and tram stops are just 250 metres away and lots of shops can be found in the immediate vicinity. Within 5 minutes' walk you can get to a shopping and entertainment centre, also featuring many restaurants.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Budapest
description: Conveniently located in the middle of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Budapest. It also provides free wireless internet. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Facilities include an all-hours reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. The hotel also has its very own fitness centre, Body Rock. The rooms at Hard Rock Hotel Budapest are air-conditioned and include a coffee maker, ironing facilities and a mini bar. Those staying at Hard Rock Hotel Budapest can dine on local and international cuisines at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. The hotel is close to Budapest-Nyugati Railway Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Budapest and its surrounding areas. The Dohany Street Synagogue, Hungarian Parliament Building and Deak Ferenc Ter are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Hotel Memories Oldtown
description: Situated in Budapest, a 5-minute walk from the Great Market Hall, Hotel Memories OldTown offers a wellness area with a fitness centre. At the hotel, the rooms feature hand-made, industrial or vintage furniture. All units have a desk, a flat-screen smart cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, a cosmetic mirror and free toiletries. Guest rooms at Hotel Memories OldTown feature air conditioning, a Nespresso coffee machine, a kettle and a wardrobe. Guests can enjoy rich buffet breakfast from fresh ingredients purchased from selected producers and suppliers. Hotel Memories OldTown offers a wellness centre with a Finnish sauna, a hot tub, fitness corner and a massage room. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near Hotel Memories OldTown. Speaking both English and Hungarian, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Hungarian National Museum is 230 metres from the hotel. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 20 km from Hotel Memories OldTown.

name: Ibis Styles Budapest Center
description: ibis Styles Budapest Center is located in the heart of Hungary's capital in a beautiful historical building. It is a perfect location with the most comfortable access to both the financial and historical parts of the city. Have a perfect night sleep in one of our comfortable 130 rooms filled with energy. All-you-can-eat buffet breakfast, unlimited Wi-Fi access and many more extras that don't cost extra: kids' corner, special family offers with games and other surprises.accorhotels.com

name: Corvin Residence Apartments
description: Corvin Residence Apartments offers accommodation within 2.6 km of the centre of Budapest, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. Private parking is available on site. All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and coffee machine. There is also a stovetop, kitchenware and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Corvin Residence Apartments include Hungarian National Museum, Blaha Lujza Square and Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Golden Park Budapest
description: Hotel Golden Park Budapest is centrally located in the heart of Budapest's business district, close to many tourist attractions and just opposite the East Railway Station (Keleti pályaudvar). Free WiFi is available in all areas. The Syma Hall, Puskás Aréna and Aréna Plaza, one of Central Europe's largest shopping centres, are only a few minutes' walk away. All the important sights are easily reachable. The impressive 100-year old building of Hotel Golden Park Budapest features a stunning facade and houses elegantly furnished rooms with soundproofed windows and a separate non-smoking floor.

name: Silver Hotel Budapest City Center
description: The Silver Hotel Budapest City Centre enjoys a central location next to the Vörösmarty utca metro station and Andrássy Avenue. It offers rooms with a TV and free internet access. All sights can be reached on foot from the Silver Hotel Budapest, which was created by adding additional floors atop a historic building. In front of the Silver Hotel Budapest City Centre there is the big, green Hunyadi Square, featuring a children's playground. Oktogon Square is 400 metres away. The reception staff is at your disposal 24 hours a day.

name: Hotel City Inn
description: Located 100 metres from a shopping centre and 500 metres from the Corvin-negyed Metro Station in Budapest, Hotel City Inn offers a 24-hour bar, a furnished terrace and a free sauna. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. Each room features air conditioning and comes with a flat-screen satellite TV, coffee and tea making facilities, a kettle, a desk, a telephone and a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms feature a balcony or terrace. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning. There are numerous cafés, restaurants and bars in a radius of 300 metres. The nearest grocery store is set within 100 metres of Hotel City Inn. There is a children’s playground on the premises. The property also provides free luggage storage, as well as 24-hour reception services. The Great Market Hall can be reached in 1.4 km, while the Hungarian National Museum is 1.3 km from Hotel City Inn. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is at the distance of 18 km.

name: Maverick Hostel & Ensuites
description: The Maverick Hostel & Ensuites is located in a fully renovated, turn of the century residential building. Free Wi-Fi is available, and there is a 24-hour supermarket in the same building. The Ferenciek Tere M3 Metro Stop can be reached within 1 minute. Bed linen and towels are provided free of charge. Guests can use shared kitchens and lounge areas with TV. Free tea and coffee are provided throughout the day. On Mondays, Wednesdays and Saturdays, various social events take place at the Maverick Hostel and Doubles. Many bars and nightclubs are within a 10-minute walk, and most sights can be reached within 15 minutes.

name: Triple M Hotel
description: Located 800 metres from a shopping centre in Budapest, the Triple M Hotel offers a non-stop bar, and free WiFi access. The nearest metro station is at II. János Pál Pápa Tér, within 850 metres from the property. Each unit comes with a TV, a desk and a refrigerator. The private bathroom is fitted with a hairdryer. Breakfast is available at Triple M Hotel. There are several grocery stores and a restaurant in a radius of 300 metres. The area of Ráday Utca with numerous restaurants and bars is at the distance of 1.6 km. The Great Market Hall is 2 km from the premises. Liszt Ferenc International Airport is 17.4 km away.

name: City Hotel Pilvax
description: Situated in the pedestrian area in the heart of Budapest, in a quiet street devoid of traffic, the Pilvax Hotel is just a few minutes' walk from bustling Váci Street. There is a free internet corner in the lobby and free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms. The Ferenciek tere metro stop is just 2 to 3 minutes away, providing easy access to the main sights of the impressive Hungarian capital. Comfortable, air-conditioned rooms invite you to relax after a busy day doing business or sightseeing. Free toiletries can be requested at the reception.

name: Walzer Hotel
description: The charming Hotel Walzer can be found surrounded by mansions and greenery on the Buda side of the Hungarian capital, within easy reach of Budapest's city centre.Wireless internet is available in the entire hotel free of charge. The castle-like, thoroughly renovated building includes a sauna, a restaurant serving tasty Hungarian and international cuisine, and a bar. Unlimited coffee and tea are included in the room rate. You can park your car for free on the site of the Walzer Hotel. Hotel Walzer is situated 8 km from the International Bus Station Népliget, 8.3 km from Syma, 9.7 km from Hungexpo and 18 km from the airport. The tram station is 20 meters from the hotel towards Széll Kálmán Tér transport hub and the Déli Train Station. The city center is 6 km from the hotel, 30 minutes by public transportation.

name: Hotel Memories Budapest
description: Hotel Memories Budapest is situated in 30 metres from Dohány Street Synagogue in Budapest.
