Built in 1900, the property is within 100 metres from Deak Ferenc Square interchange metro station. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and concierge service. Featuring a fitness corner with infrared sauna, the rooms in the hotel are equipped with a mini fridge, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a capsule coffee machine, and in some of the rooms Shabbat facilities. All rooms include a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. A rich buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. Coffee and other beverages are available all day long in the club lounge free of charge. There is also an a la carte restaurant on site. Guests can also use the conference facilities for an additional fee. Computer is available for guests to use. Parking is available 150 meters from the hotel for an extra fee. Hungarian National Museum is a 7-minute walk from Hotel Memories Budapest, while St. Stephen's Basilica is an 8-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Canada Hotel Budapest
description: Easily accessible from the motorways and Ferihegy Airport and completely renovated in 2018, Canada Hotel Budapest is 1.5 km from Rákóczi Bridge and the Palace of Arts. It offers free WiFi throughout the property and private parking. All rooms at the Canada Hotel Budapest are equipped with a private bathroom, flat-screen satellite TV and a work desk. Air-conditioning is available in all rooms. Ironing services as well as luggage storage is available at the hotel. The Canada is situated directly at the Ken utca suburban railway station, offering good connections to the historical centre of Budapest.

name: a&o Budapest City
description: Attractively located in the centre of Budapest, a&o Budapest City features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Dohany Street Synagogue, Hungarian State Opera and Keleti Railway Station. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and an ATM for guests. Guest rooms in the hostel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Guests at a&o Budapest City can enjoy a continental or a vegetarian breakfast. Speaking German, English and Hungarian at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Blaha Lujza Square, House of Terror and Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from a&o Budapest City.

name: Peregrino Panzió
description: No description found

name: Mystery Hotel Budapest
description: Mystery Hotel Budapest is a historically themed luxury hotel located in the 6th district in downtown Budapest, in an eclectic palace built in the 19th century. This 5-star hotel offers free WiFi and in-house spa and wellness area. Hungarian State Opera is 900 m away and St. Stephen's Basilica is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Guests at Mystery Hotel Budapest can enjoy a rich buffet breakfast in the Great Hall Restaurant & Lounge which also serves international cuisine. Rooms and suites at Mystery Hotel Budapest are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine, shower, free toiletries and a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while selected rooms also feature a seating area. Guest rooms at the hotel have individually controlled air conditioning and a wardrobe equipped with a hair dryer.

name: Onefam Budapest
description: Onefam Budapest is located 300 metres from the Deák Ferenc Tér stop, which connects to 3 of the Budapest metro lines, as well as bus and tram lines. Free WiFi is provided in all areas and computers are available in the lobby. A bar serving drinks can be found on site. The closest restaurant and shop are 100 metres away, while a range of ruin pubs and bars are within 300 metres. Tickets for attractions and events around town can be booked at the hostel's 24-hour reception. Each guest has a locker at their disposal. Bed linen are provided, and bathroom and toilet facilities are shared. The hostel offers free daytime activities, and evening events. Public parking is possible on the premises for an additional cost. The Dohány Street Synagogue can be reached within 2 minutes on foot and the St. Stephen's Basilica is 600 metres from the hostel.

name: Wombat's City Hostel Budapest
description: Set in the centre of Budapest, right opposite the bustling Gozsdu Udvar with several cafés, bars and restaurants, Wombat's The City Hostel Budapest offers a bar, vending machines and air-conditioning. Deák Ferenc Tér, where three metro lines and several bus and tram lines meet, is within 300 metres. Free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas. There are en-suite rooms and beds in mixed dormitory rooms at Wombat's The City Hostel Budapest. A locker is provided for each guest. Linen is included, and towels can be requested at the reception for a fee. The 24-hour hostel has a common kitchen, a laundry room and there are billiard facilities,We have a new Café! There are several grocery stores in a radius of 250 metres. Kazincy Utca ruin pub area can be reached within 300 metres and Szimpla Kert is 650 metres away. The Wombats is 300 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica Square and 800 metres from the Chain Bridge. Liszt Ferenc Airport is situated 20 km away. There is a direct bus to the airport from Deak.

name: The Hive Party Hostel
description: Featuring a shared lounge, a terrace and free WiFi access in all areas, The Hive Party Hostel Budapest offers daily parties and concerts to its guests. The hostel offers a dance club with live performances in the courtyard and a rooftop bar. All rooms and dormitories here are air-conditioned and feature a wardrobe. The bathrooms are either private or shared, fitted with showers. The Hive Party Hostel Budapest also features a 24-hour front desk. Guests can prepare their meals in the shared, well-equipped kitchen, or choose from the various dining options found within walking distance. The hostel is located in central Budapest, within 700 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica and 500 metres from Deak Ferenc Square Metro Station. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 20 km away.

name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Budapest M-Square
description: The Leonardo Boutique Hotel Budapest M-Square is situated in the heart of the city, about 150 metres from the Deák Square, the Budapest's main subway hub. It offers free WiFi. All stylish, air-conditioned rooms come equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels, coffee and tea making facilities. Some have a separate living room and a bedroom area and some rooms come with terrace. A breakfast is available each morning at the Leonardo Boutique Hotel Budapest M-Square.

name: Up Hotel Budapest
description: Set in Budapest, 300 metres from House of Terror, Up Hotel Budapest offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, an ATM and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms come with a kettle, while some rooms come with a balcony and others also have city views. At Up Hotel Budapest all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. At Up Hotel Budapest guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Blaha Lujza Square, Hungarian State Opera and Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from Up Hotel Budapest.

name: Budapest Csaszar Hotel
description: The Csaszar Hotel is located in the centre of Buda, a 5-minute walk away from Margaret Bridge and several restaurants. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi. The building was erected in the 1850s, and initially functioned as a nunnery. The atmosphere of the rooms is pleasant and modern, yet they are reminiscent of the origins of the building. The Lukács Thermal Bath is just 150 metres away from the Csaszar hotel and provides a full range of therapeutic services. The famous Gellért Bath is easily accessible by public transport within 15 minutes. If you wish to stay on half-board basis, this can be arranged with a nearby restaurant. Moreover all guests of Hotel Császár enjoy discounted prices there.

name: Baroque Hostel & Coworking
address: Dózsa György Út 80./ Kertkapu Bejárat, Budapest 1071
description: Located right next to the City Park and 200 metres from Heroes square, the Museum of Fine Arts, Széchenyi Thermal Baths and the Zoo. Baroque offers simply furnished rooms. It offers 24 hour reception, laundry service, free WiFi and printing possibility. Each of Baroque Hostel & Coworking’s units have shared bathroom facilities. It has spacious living areas with smart TV, X-box games console, a fully equipped kitchen, power sockets for each dorm bed and a small garden. The hostel features a 3 fully equipped common kitchen with a microwave, a coffee maker and a refrigerator. There are also many restaurants and bars in the surrounding area. The Vajdahunyad Castle is only 500 metres from the hostel, State Opera House is an 8-minute drive away and Westend Shopping Centre is a 7-minute drive away. Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport is 15 km away, and an airport shuttle service is available.

name: Evergreen Budapest Guest House
description: Located in an authentic, historic building in Budapest, Evergreen Budapest Guest House provides spacious rooms with private bathrooms and cable TV. Free WiFi access is available. Breakfast is served each morning and coffee and tea is available throughout the day in the lounge area. Towels for outside use (thermal bath, pools) are provided free of charge on request as well. All rooms feature parquet floors and are decorated in traditional style. Within easy walking distance from the guest house there are various restaurants, pubs and cafés, while a shopping centre is 300 metres from the premises. The Hungarian Parliament Building is 1 km away. The property can also arrange bike rental and car hire. Nyugati Train Station is 300 metres away, where metro line M3 and the non-stop tram line 6 intersect. The airport is about a 45-minute ride from the Evergreen Budapest Guest House and an airport shuttle can be arranged for a surcharge.

name: Corvin holiday Apartments hotel
description: Offering balcony and views of the garden, Corvin holiday Apartments hotel is located in Budapest, 170 metres from the Corvin Plaza shopping centre with numerous restaurants, shops, as well as a wellness and fitness centre. Private parking is available but limited on site and free WiFi access is provided. Each accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven, microwave and fridge. There is also a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer in every unit. Great Market Hall is 1.7 km from Corvin holiday Apartments hotel, while Chain Bridge is 3.3 km away. Klinikák Metro Station on line M3 is at the distance of 450 metres, while the Grand Boulevard with the non-stop tram line 6 is reachable in 700 metres. The nearest airport is Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Maverick City Lodge
description: In the centre of Budapest, the Maverick City Lodge boutique hostel is 750 metres from the Deák Ferenc Tér transfer station for all 3 city’s metro lines; it features air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi in all areas, and on-site bicycle rentals. The property was renovated at the end of 2013. Each private room at the Maverick is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, while dormitory rooms come functionally furnished. Bathroom facilities can be en-suite or shared with other guests. A spacious common room and a well-equipped shared kitchen are at guests’ disposal, and free coffee and tea are offered. The reception is open 24/7. Laundry facilities, ticket service and airport shuttle are offered at an additional cost. Padlocks for the lockers are available for purchase at reception. A la carte breakfast is available at the property, it can be requested upon arrival. Maverick City Lodge is located on the popular Kazinczy Street with a variety of bars, restaurants and shops within a 100-metre reach. The Gosdu Court is 200 metres away, while the Váci Street is reachable in 900 metres. Many Budapest attractions are also within an easy reach on foot. The Dohány Street Synagogue is 350 metres away, while the Danube River is 1 km from the property.

name: Boulevard City Panzió - self check-in
description: Situated just behind the Grand Boulevard and within walking distance to the main sights, you will find the Boulevard City Panzió - self check-in in a quiet area in the middle of Budapest. The Boulevard City Panzió - self check-in is situated on the top floors of an apartment building, close to the Petöfi Bridge on the Pest side of the city. The main shops, restaurants and attractions of Budapest are reachable on foot. Every room at this guest house is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. You will find a kettle in the room. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer.

name: art'otel budapest, by park plaza
description: Situated in the centre of Budapest, right on the banks of the Danube river, the Park Plaza Budapest offers panoramic views of the Danube, the Fisherman's Bastion and other famous sights. Wireless internet is available in the entire hotel free of charge and you enjoy free access to the sauna and the fitness facilities. You will find a complimentary newspaper in your room. Suites also offer complimentary coffee and tea making facilities, luxury cotton bathrobes and a welcome bottle of mineral water. The Bar offers coffee specialities and cakes. Breakfast, is available at the Drawing Room Restaurant every morning and includes fresh fruit, croissants, coffee specialities and yoghurt. It takes you only a 10-minute walk to reach the World Heritage site of the Buda Castle as well as the pedestrianized shopping area. You can park your car on site.

name: Airport Almáskert Panzió
description: Located in Vecsés, Airport Almáskert Panzió offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as access to a garden with barbecue. A fridge and kettle are also featured. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Airport Almáskert Panzió provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Hungarian National Museum is 19 km from the accommodation, while Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 3 km from Airport Almáskert Panzió.

name: Island Hostel Budapest
description: Island Hostel Budapest has a cheerful atmosphere and is located on the car-free Margaret Island, surrounded by nature. You can make pleasant memories on our comfortable 200 m2 terrace, which is bathed in special lights overlooking the Danube and the Parliament building, and is excellent for spending your free time. Our common kitchen is fully equipped, suitable for baking and cooking. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the building. The rooms are functionally furnished, have a private bathroom, and the dormitories have shared bathroom facilities and most rooms equipped with USB charging facilities and reading lights. The Palatinus Beach is 200 metres from the hostel. The stop of trams 4 and 6 running through the city is located 750 m from the hostel and can be reached by walk. Palatinus Beach is 200 meters away. Bus 26 to the city center is 260 meters away. The Parliament building and the tram to Buda Castle can also be reached by walk. Public parking is available for an additional fee and 15 minutes walk from the accommodation.

name: Dean's College Hotel
description: Well set in the centre of Budapest, Dean's Home Budapest provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is set 2.8 km from Dohany Street Synagogue, 3 km from Blaha Lujza Square and 3 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.8 km from Hungarian National Museum. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, while some rooms here will provide you with a kitchen fitted with a microwave. At Dean's Home Budapest each room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play billiards at this 3-star hotel, and bike hire is available. Speaking German, English and Hungarian at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Keleti Railway Station is 3.4 km from Dean's Home Budapest, while Hungarian State Opera is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Beatrix Hotel
description: The Beatrix Hotel is quietly located in the green belt of Budapest, close to the historical Castle district and the centre. WiFi and private parking are available for free. In some rooms air conditioning is also available. Rooms with air conditioning can be requested in advance and are subject to availability. In summer you can take part in barbecue and goulash parties. Refreshments are served on the inviting terrace. The Beatrix Hotel is easily accessible from the M1 and M7 highways. Within 20 minutes you can get to the centre by public transport or within 10 minutes by car. Buda Castle and the Mammut Shopping Mall are 4 km away. The next bus stop is 300 metres away. Free private, secure car parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Benczur
description: Situated in the embassy quarter of Budapest, Benczur Hotel provides a peaceful spot in the centre of this busy city. It has a lovely garden and a restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the house. Located just a 5-minute drive from Oktogon Square, all rooms at Hotel Benczur have satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel’s Zsolnay Restaurant serves a combination of traditional Hungarian food, innovative modern cuisine and vegetarian dishes. During the summer, guests can also dine on the beautiful garden terrace. The closest metro station is Bajza Utca, located on the M1 metro line, 350 metres away. Numerous attractions are a short walk away, the Budapest Zoo is 900 metres from the property, the City Park is 10 minutes and the Széchenyi thermal bath is 15 minutes away on foot.

name: Centerpoint Panzio
description: Offering city views and free WiFi, Centerpoint Panzio offers accommodation conveniently located in the centre of Budapest, within a short distance of Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, Keleti Railway Station and House of Terror. Every unit has a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. A minibar and kettle are also offered. Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Dohany Street Synagogue, Hungarian State Opera and Hungarian National Museum. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 13 km from Centerpoint Panzio.

name: T62 Hotel
description: Attractively set in Budapest, T62 Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Dohany Street Synagogue, Blaha Lujza Square and Hungarian Parliament Building. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 3-star hotel. Speaking German, English, Spanish and Hungarian at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near T62 Hotel include House of Terror, St. Stephen's Basilica and Hungarian State Opera. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Soho Boutique Hotel
description: Soho Boutique Hotel located between the Eastern and Western train stations is surrounded by trendy boutiques, great restaurants and impressive sights. The 76 guest rooms - including 8 junior suites - are all well-equipped with soundproofed windows and LCD TVs featuring numerous film channels. The Boutique Hotel Soho meets every need for style and elegance and is situated in the vicinity of the city’s pulsing cultural scene, entertainment and nightlife. The Danube, Váci street, the Synagogue, Budapest’s “Broadway”, the best restaurants, theatres and concert halls are all located nearby and easily accessible thanks to the excellent public transport system in the area. The distinctive atmosphere of the Soho hotel combines stylish comfort with sensual elegance.

name: Irini Panzió
description: The family-run Irini Panzió is located in a quiet green area of Budapest, a 5-minute walk from the Kispest Train Station. It offers air-conditioned studios, free Wi-Fi and free parking. All studios have a fully equipped kitchen, a minibar and individually controllable air-conditioning. After a day of doing business or sightseeing you can relax at the bar with your favourite drink. The reception is open 24 hours a day. Budapest's Ferihegy Airport is 8 km away. The Irini guest house offers an airport transfer service. The M3 metro station can be reached within a 10-minute tram ride with tram number 50. From the metro station, the city centre is a 20-minute ride away.

name: City Hotel Unio Superior
description: Boasting a central spot 80 metres from the Grand Boulevard, City Hotel UNIO superior is a 3-star superior hotel within easy walking distance of all historic sights and with great public transport links. All rooms feature double glazed windows providing for a peaceful night's rest. Benefit from the impressive meeting facilities of the City Hotel UNIO superior which cater for up to 50 people. The 2 conference rooms offer air-conditioning and are ideal venues for business and leisure occasions.

name: Grand Jules - Boat Hotel
description: Grand Jules - Boat Hotel is a boat hotel on the Danube riverbank in the Buda side of Budapest. Hungarian Parliament Building is 800 metres from the property. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. Each cabin has a shower, TV, telephone, heating and air conditioning. Some also feature views of the Parliament Building. Several restaurants and cafés are reachable in 250 metres, while a grocery store is set 300 metres away. The non-stop tram line 6, as well as several other tram lines and suburban railway H5 can be reached within 200 metres. Metro line M2 at Batthyány Tér is at the distance of 800 metres. Matthias Church is 1.4 km from Grand Jules - Boat Hotel. The nearest airport is Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport, 19 km from Grand Jules - Boat Hotel.

name: Váralja Home
description: Located in Budapest, 1 km from the centre and 600 metres from Budapest History Museum, Váralja Home provides accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. The aparthotel provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Váralja Home include Buda Castle, Matthias Church and Trinity Square. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Baltazár Boutique Hotel by Zsidai Hotels
description: Located above an à la carte grill restaurant in the Castle area, Baltazár Budapest provides tastefully furnished en suite accommodation units. Free WiFi is available in each unit. All rooms and suites are individually decorated with warm colours and elegant furniture, as well as cable TV and a small fridge. The bathrooms come with a shower cabin or a bathtub. À la carte breakfast is available in the restaurant on request. Daily breakfast is included in your reservation: freshly baked croissants, jam and butter, one glass of orange or apple juice, one hot drink – specialty coffee or a tea, and a bottle of clean water. The Hungarian National Gallery is a 15-minute walk from the Baltazár Budapest, while the River Danube is 1 km away. The Parliament and the downtown of the Pest side can be reached within 30 minutes on foot. Public parking is possible on site.

name: Vitae Hostel
description: Situated in Budapest and with Blaha Lujza Square reachable within less than 1 km, Vitae Hostel features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is close to House of Terror, Keleti Railway Station and Hungarian National Museum. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a shared kitchen. Rooms come with a shared bathroom with a shower, while some rooms include a kitchen with a fridge. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Dohany Street Synagogue, Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station and Hungarian State Opera. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 14 km from Vitae Hostel.

name: Silver Crown Hotel & Residence
description: Set in Budapest, within 0.4 km of Dohany Street Synagogue and 0.7 km of Hungarian National Museum, Silver Crown Residence features accommodation with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen. Complimentary WiFi is offered. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with free toiletries and a hair dryer. Great Market Hall is 1.2 km from the aparthotel, while State Opera House is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 21 km from Silver Crown Residence.

name: Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa
description: Situated in Budapest, 1.2 km from Hungarian National Museum, Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa - The Leading Hotels of the World features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, 1.7 km from Keleti Railway Station and 1.6 km from Dohany Street Synagogue. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge. At Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa - The Leading Hotels of the World rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. You can play billiards at this 5-star hotel, and car hire is available. Blaha Lujza Square is less than 1 km from Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa - The Leading Hotels of the World, while House of Terror is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Box Studio In Ruin Pub District
description: Located in the centre of Budapest, 300 metres from Blaha Lujza Square and 700 metres from Dohany Street Synagogue, BOX Studio in Ruin Pub District offers free WiFi. The property was built in 1940 and features accommodation with a patio. The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchenette with microwave and toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, House of Terror and Keleti Railway Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 13 km from BOX Studio in Ruin Pub District, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bliss Hotel & Wellness
description: This 4-star superior hotel is located in the centre of Budapest, a 2-minute walk from Oktogon Metro Station. It features an indoor pool, a hot tub and modern rooms and apartments. The Bliss Hotel & Wellness has a wellness/fitness area with a swimming pool, sauna and a massage area. A spacious fitness centre with a personal trainer is also on site. Each accommodation unit has free access to WiFi. A flat-screen TV is also provided. The contemporary bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer. Bliss Hotel & Wellness is close to shops, cafés and restaurants. Secured private parking is available at the hotel against a fee. Bicycles can be rented at the property for a surcharge, and free walking city tours can be organised.

name: Queen's Court Hotel & Residence
description: The Queen’s Court Hotel & Residence is ideally located in the heart of Budapest and it boasts a lavish retro-classical spa area with indoor pool and a hot tub. A quiet garden in the courtyard invites all guests to relax. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. The Queen’s Court provides spacious, individually designed suites with balconies, air conditioning and kitchenettes. Some also have a spacious living room and a dining area. The in-house Chess Restaurant & Bar serves international cuisine and fine wines. The Blaha Lujza tér M2 Metro Station is 650 metres from the property, while the Deák Ferenc tér hub, as well as the St.Stephen's Basilica can be reached within a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Private parking is possible on site.

name: Stories Boutique Hotel
description: Conveniently located in the 06. Terézváros district of Budapest, Stories Boutique Hotel is set 500 metres from Hungarian State Opera, 1.2 km from Blaha Lujza Square and 1.2 km from House of Terror. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Dohany Street Synagogue. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Stories Boutique Hotel all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Hungarian. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Stephen's Basilica, Hungarian National Museum and Hungarian Parliament Building. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from Stories Boutique Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Medos Hotel
description: Fully renovated in 2013, the Medos Hotel is situated off Andrássy Avenue, just 100 metres away from Liszt Ferenc tér and the Oktogon Metro Station. Wi-Fi is available for free. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. All rooms are air-conditioned, and some have a balcony with views of the city. Most of Budapest's main sights are reachable within a 5- to 10-minute walk from the Medos Hotel. These include the Opera House, the Danube River and the Saint Stephen's Basilica. Private parking is available at a location nearby, for an additional fee.

name: Alfréd Panzió
description: Our reception is open from 07:30 until 20:30. If the arrival time is beyond our opening hours, than we send access codes and some informations how can occupy a room. The Alfred Panzio is located 10 km from the centre of Budapest, which is easily accessible by public transport, and offers you a familiar atmosphere. The beautiful open-air baths Romai and Csillaghegyi are situated in the immediate vicinity and you can reach the Danube banks within a few minutes' walk. A conference hall is available for meetings of up to 35 people and wireless internet is available in the entire hotel free of charge. After a day of sightseeing or doing business you can fully relax in the sauna on site.

name: Hotel Gloria Budapest
description: This pet-friendly hotel is located in Budapest and features free Wi-Fi. It also offers a currency exchange, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. There are a range of amenities available to guests of Hotel Gloria Budapest, such as luggage storage, a ticket service and a tour desk. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service, a wake-up service and a laundry service are available upon request. The rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a refrigerator, and boast views of the garden. They are all soundproofed and include a telephone, an in-room closet and a ceiling fan. Hotel Gloria Budapest's restaurant is open for lunch and dinner, providing guests with an easy dining experience near their room. Hotel Gloria Budapest is close to Nepliget Metro Station and Nagyvarad Ter Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Budapest and its surrounding areas. The hotel's multilingual staff are available to ensure that every guest has an enjoyable stay.Revato

name: Agape Apartments
description: No description found

name: Nova Apartments
description: Located in the centre and just 300 metres from Blaha Lujza Square and the underground station, the Nova Aparthotel is a great base for exploring the city, providing utmost independence. The comfortable apartments are air conditioned with a fully equipped kitchen, large living room and free WiFi. The property is ideal for people wanting to be close to several tourist attractions including the State Opera House, Heroes Square and St Stephens Basilica. There are numerous dining options in the surroundings, including Italian, Hungarian and Asian cuisine. Guests will find many bars and clubs nearby. The Nova Aparthotel is housed in a brand-new building which has a 24-hour reception on Friday and Saturday. Free bicycle and DVD rental is also available on site.

name: Corvin Plaza Apartments & Suites
description: Located at Kisfaludy Street just around the corner from the vibrant Grand Boulevard, Corvin Plaza Apartments & Suites features modern, stylish accommodation units and free Wi-Fi in the whole building. It is 300 metres from the Corvin-Negyed M3 Metro Stop and the tram no. 4-6. An LCD TV, a sofa bed, and a dining area are standard facilities in each apartment. The kitchens are fully equipped and include basic cooking ingredients like salt and pepper. The bathrooms are coming with a hairdryer. Air conditioning is available in some units on request and for surcharge. A playground for children is also featured in the courtyard of the building. Numerous restaurants, cafés and bars can be found in the nearest vicinity of the Corvin Plaza, as well as within walking distance. Corvin Sétány Shopping Centre is 400 metres away, and the central Váci Street and Vörösmarty Square can be reached in a 20-minute walk. Private parking is possible on site. The reception offers tickets for a wide range of sightseeing tours, to the thermal baths, concerts and other cultural programs.

name: Classic Hotel
description: The Classic Hotel is situated at the foot of the Buda Hills in a calm and elegant neighbourhood, with easy access to the motorways (M1/M7) and the city centre of Budapest. All rooms are equipped with free WiFi, an LCD TV with satellite channels, a mini fridge, a private bath or shower, free toiletries, a hairdryer, a wardrobe. The apartments come with coffee machine, and mini kitchen. Some rooms are equipped with air conditioning. Fully equipped conference facilities are also available on the site with free WiFi in the entire property.The hotel offers rich buffet breakfast with hot and cold meals, and free coffee. The reception can provide further advice in order to help you to plan your day better. Rudas and Gellért Themal Baths are 2 km from the property, while Buda Castle is 2.1 km. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport 18.5 km away.

name: Adagio Downtown Minihotel
description: Located in the 06. Terézváros district in Budapest, Adagio Downtown MiniHotel offers 3-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is around 2.3 km from Keleti Railway Station, 1.6 km from Dohany Street Synagogue and 1.3 km from St. Stephen's Basilica. The property is 200 metres from House of Terror, and within 1.4 km of the city centre. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are equipped with a balcony. At Adagio Downtown MiniHotel each room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Heroes' Square, Hungarian State Opera and Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from Adagio Downtown MiniHotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Jazzy Vibes Parliament Rooms and Ensuites
description: Located in one of the nicest and safest areas of downtown Budapest next to the Parliament, several major sights and the Danube, Jazzy Vibes Parliament Hostel & Ensuites offers you cosy and clean accommodation. The Kossuth square metro station is also next to the hotel, so everything is easily accessible. Jazzy Vibes Parliament Hostel & Ensuites is situated on the second floor of a nice, historic Pest building, offering double, twin, triple rooms. Three rooms have a shared bathroom and 2 rooms come with private bathroom. There is a living room connected to a big guest kitchen which is very well equipped with an oven, a microwave, a fridge and a washing machine. There is also a nice terrace where smoking is allowed. The multi-lingual staff is happy to assist you in every respect. Free wireless internet access is provided in all rooms. There you also find a satellite TV. Bike rental is available as well. A 24/7 coffee shop is situated in the same building, offering premium coffee and an impressive beer selection. A supermarket can be found just 30 metres away and restaurants, bars and clubs and cash machines can be found within a 100-metre radius from Jazzy Vibes Parliament Hostel & Ensuites.

name: Hotel Sissy Residence
description: Situated in Budapest, 1.5 km from the centre and 400 metres from Blaha Lujza Square, Hotel Sissy Residence features accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. The bed and breakfast provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings. Popular points of interest near Hotel Sissy Residence include Dohany Street Synagogue, Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station and House of Terror. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Prince Apartments
description: Situated in Budapest and with the Danube River reachable in 1 km, Prince Apartments offers accommodation with modern facilities, as well as a helpful front desk, a garden and a business centre. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Most of the apartments come with a balcony and a garden view. Some of the units contain a seating area with a sofa bed, a flat-screen satellite TV and a DVD-player. Each also includes a well-fitted kitchenette with a microwave. Shuttle transports can be arranged at an additional cost. Other surcharged services available for guests include luggage storage, dry cleaning and ironing service. The nearest tram stop is reachable within 200 metres and the metro line 3 is located 400 metres away. The Corvin Plaza is situated 200 metres away and the Historical Museum can be reached within 900 metres. The Grand Market Hall and the Gellért Thermal Bath are in a radius of 1.8 km from the apartments.

name: The Amberlyn Suite Hotel
description: No description found

name: Klebelsberg Kastély Budapest
description: Located in Budapest, 11 km from Matthias Church, Klebelsberg Kastély Budapest provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. Located around 11 km from Fisherman's Bastion, the hotel with free WiFi is also 11 km away from Budapest History Museum. The property is non-smoking and is situated 11 km from Trinity Square. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. Languages spoken at the reception include English and Hungarian, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Buda Castle is 12 km from Klebelsberg Kastély Budapest, while Chain Bridge is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: 7x24 Central Hostel
description: This hostel is 400 metres away from Budapest's St. Stephen's Basilica at Deak Square. 7x24 Central Hostel features free Wi-Fi, free safes at the reception and a common kitchen. Deak Square is a good starting point to explore Budapest - 3 metro lines meet there. There are many pubs, clubs and restaurants in the vicinity. The 7x24 Central provides a fully equipped common kitchen with an oven and stovetop. On request, breakfast is possible at a cafe in the immediate vicinity of the hostel. Guests can also make use of the common lounge area with a TV, DVD and 2 PCs with free internet access. Some of the rooms have air conditioning and wooden floors. Towels and linen are provided free of charge.

name: Éjjeli Bagoly Étterem és Panzió
description: Situated in Budapest, 2.8 km from Keleti Railway Station and 3.2 km from Puskas Ferenc Stadion, Éjjeli Bagoly Étterem és Panzió features a restaurant, city views and free WiFi. Some of the units have a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, and a private bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The bed and breakfast offers a terrace. A car rental service is available at Éjjeli Bagoly Étterem és Panzió. Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Heroes' Square is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 10 km from Éjjeli Bagoly Étterem és Panzió.

name: The Magazine Hotel & Apartments
description: Located in the immediate vicinity of St Stephen’s Basilica and 250 metres from Andrássy Avenue in the busy and boisterous centre of Budapest, The Magazine Hotel & Apartments offers free WiFi access and concierge service. Each air-conditioned unit at the property comprises a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Complimentary toiletries are provided and hair dryers are available upon request at reception. Some units also feature views of the city. An À-la-carte breakfast is served at a restaurant set a 10-minute walk from the property. There are numerous restaurants, cafés and bars within a radius of 150 metres, while a grocery store is set 230 metres from The Magazine Hotel & Apartments. A beauty salon in the neighborhood provides special discounts and services for guests. The pedestrian shopping area Vörösmarty Tér and Váci Utca can be reached in 600 metres. The property is 550 metres from State Opera House and 700 metres from Chain Bridge. The transportation hub Deák Ferenc Tér with 3 metro lines and several tram and bus lines is within 350 metres from the premises. Liszt Ferenc Airport is 20 km away and the property can arrange a shuttle transfer for a surcharge.

name: Gartner Hotel
description: Located just a 10-minute walk from the Hungarian Opera House and the Opera metro station, Gartner Hotel offers rooms with en-suite bathroom and free WiFi. Situated in Budapest's 7th district, the spacious rooms at Queen Mary Hotel have en suite bathrooms with hairdryer and bathtub or shower. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, minibar and TV, and some rooms also have a balcony. The Western Railway Station is 2 tram stops away, while the Eastern Railway Station is just one metro stop away. Blaha Lujza Square, the closest metro station, is on the M2 line and just a 7-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Aranyeso Vendeghaz Csorbai
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Aranyeső Vendégház Csorbai is located in Budapest. Free WiFi access is available in all rooms. Free public parking is possible off site. Buffet breakfast is provided for guests. Each room at the property features cable TV, a balcony with garden and pool views and a dining table. Private bathroom comes with a shower. At Aranyeső Vendégház Csorbai guests can enjoy table tennis free of charge or relax in a garden. A snack bar and a mini-market are also available. The guest house is located a 13-minute drive away from Gellért Thermal Baths, an 11-minute drive away from Budapest Congress Centre Convention centre and 12-minute drive away from Citadella Monument. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is reachable within 23 km.

name: Pop Up Hostels - Downtown
description: PopUp Hostels - Downtown is a mixture of a hostel and a budget hotel in the centre of Budapest, on the famous semi-pedestrian Ráday street, in the heart of the entertainment zone. Free Wi-Fi is provided in the lobby. Every room has a refrigerator and a wardrobe. All rooms have private bathrooms. Bed linen is provided. The street is full of cafés, bars and restaurants. The Bakáts square with its beautiful church and the famous Nándori pastry shop and the Grand Boulevard are just around the corner. The river Danube is also close by.

name: Óbudai Diákszálló
description: Located in Budapest, 3.3 km from Margaret Island Japanese Garden, Óbudai Diákszálló provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The property is non-smoking and is set 6.3 km from Chain Bridge. At the hostel, every room has a desk. All units at Óbudai Diákszálló are equipped with a shared bathroom and bed linen. You can play table tennis and darts at the accommodation. Speaking German, English and Hungarian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area. Heroes' Square is 6.4 km from Óbudai Diákszálló, while Hungarian Parliament Building is 6.4 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 19 km from the hostel.

name: Corvin Center Suites
description: The Corvin Center Suites provides accommodations with kitchen facilities and air conditioning in Budapest, 500 metres from the Corvin-negyed M3 Metro Station. Free Wi-Fi access is available. The stylish apartments includes a flat-screen cable TV, a sitting area and a fully equipped kitchen. Featuring a bathtub, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The nearest grocery shops and restaurants are 50 metres from the Corvin Center Suites. The Grand Boulevard and the Danube River are a 5-minute walk from the building. Breakfast is available at the Mlinar, 30 metres from the property.

name: Absolut City Hostel
description: Centrally located in Budapest, 200 metres from Deák Ferenc Square and 500 metres from St. Stephen's Basilica, Absolut City Hostel offers accommodation with free WiFi and free luggage storage. Each unit here is functionally-furnished and enjoys city views. The bathroom facilities are shared and towels are available at an extra fee. Guests at Absolut City Hostel can prepare their meals in the shared, well-appointed kitchen, and relax in the common lounge. Various restaurants and grocery stores can be found within walking distance. The property is 700 metres from the State Opera House and 1 km from the Chain Bridge. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 19 km away and a shuttle transfer can be arranged at a surcharge.

name: Thomas Hotel Budapest
description: The Thomas Hotel Budapest is conveniently located 200 metres from the Grand Boulevard of Budapest and 500 metres from the Corvin-negyed M3 Metro Stop. Free WiFi is available. The simply furnished rooms are all fitted with a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms come with shower, towels are provided. Guests can start the day with a rich breakfast buffet. The Museum of Applied Arts can be visited 500 from the hotel, while the Great Market Hall is 1 km away. The Liszt Ferenc International Airport can be reached within 25 minutes by car. Private parking is possible on site.

name: Lavender Circus Hostel, Doubles & Ensuites
description: Centrally located in Budapest, opposite the Hungarian National Museum and 120 metres from Kálvin Tér transportation hub with 2 metro lines and several tram and bus lines, Lavender Circus Hostel, Doubles & Ensuites offers accommodation with free WiFi. All units come functionally furnished with stylish decoration. Linen and towels are provided. Some units come with a private bathroom, while others have access to shared bathroom facilities. Guests can make use of a kitchenette in some units, while there is also a shared kitchen at guests’ disposal. The nearest grocery store is within 50 metres, while Ráday Utca, a street renowned for its bars and restaurants, can be reached in 230 metres. The Great Market Hall is 500 metres away. You can go for a walk in the Károlyi Kert park, reachable in 300 metres, while the Váci Utca pedestrian shopping street is 500 metres from Lavender Circus Hostel, Doubles & Ensuites. The Dohány Street Synagogue is 700 metres away. Keleti Train Station is 2.2 km or 3 metro stations away, while Nyugati Train Station is 4 metro stations from the property. Liszt Ferenc Airport is at the distance of 19 km.

name: Dominik Panzio
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and laundry facilities, as well as daily housekeeping and an airport shuttle. Other amenities include towels, tour/ticket assistance, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.Expedia

name: Diana Club Hotel
description: Situated in Budapest, 1.6 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, Diana Club Hotel features views of the city. The property is around 1.7 km from Keleti Railway Station, 2.6 km from Hungarian National Museum and 2.9 km from Puskas Ferenc Stadion. The hotel also features free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms include a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Speaking German, English, Spanish and Hungarian at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Blaha Lujza Square is 3.4 km from Diana Club Hotel, while Dohany Street Synagogue is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Giselle Vintage Doubles - Adults Only
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Budapest, Giselle Vintage Doubles - Adults Only is within 1.3 km of Blaha Lujza Square and 800 metres of Hungarian National Museum. The property is around 1.1 km from St. Stephen's Basilica, 1.6 km from Budapest History Museum and 1.9 km from Citadella. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a concierge service and free WiFi. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower, the units at Giselle Vintage Doubles - Adults Only have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Giselle Vintage Doubles - Adults Only include Dohany Street Synagogue, Gellért Hill and Hungarian State Opera. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Amber Gardenview Studios Downtown
address: Veres Palne Utca 26, Ground Floor, Budapest 1053
description: No description found

name: Kárpáti Motel
description: Kárpáti Motel offers rooms with private bathroom in the 23rd district of Budapest, 50 metres from the closest bus stop. Free WiFi access is available. The unit further offers a microwave, a dining area and direct access to the garden. The bathroom is fitted with shower. The guest house is 9 km from the city centre and the Liszt Ferenc International Airport is 10 km away.

name: Ida Panzió
description: Situated in Budapest, within 3.5 km of Citadella and 3.5 km of Gellért Hill, Ida Panzió features accommodation with a garden and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting a housekeeping service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.9 km from Budapest History Museum. The rooms include air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at the guest house have a terrace. At Ida Panzió every room comes with bed linen and towels. Buda Castle is 4 km from the accommodation, while Matthias Church is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 17 km from Ida Panzió.

name: Intercityhotel Budapest
description: IntercityHotel Budapest is set in the centre of Budapest, 1.3 km from Puskas Arena. Providing a restaurant and a bar, the property is located within 2 km of House of Terror, Heroes' Square, Dohany Street Synagogue and Hungarian National Museum. Free WiFi is provided. The air-conditioned non-smoking rooms have a desk and private bathroom with shower. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a business centre and a meeting room on request. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 15 km from the property. The hotel is at a public transportation junction. There is a parking garage on site.

name: Sb Panzió
description: Ideally set in the 08. Józsefváros district of Budapest, SB Panzió is situated 1.4 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, 600 metres from Blaha Lujza Square and 1.6 km from Keleti Railway Station. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is less than 1 km from Hungarian National Museum, and within 1.9 km of the city centre. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. At SB Panzió the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include House of Terror, Dohany Street Synagogue and Hungarian State Opera. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 12 km from SB Panzió, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Vagabond Downtown
description: Situated 1.1 km from State Opera House, Vagabond Downtown provides accommodation in Budapest. The units have parquet floors and include a seating area with cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and a private bathroom. There is also an oven, microwave and a coffee machine. The aparthotel offers a terrace. St. Stephen's Basilica is 1.1 km from Vagabond Downtown, while House of Terror is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 22 km from the property. Part of Vagabond Group hotel chain.

name: Vagabond Broadway
description: No description found

name: Full Moon Budapest
description: Located in the heart of Budapest and just around the corner from the banks of the Danube River, Full Moon Budapest offers air-conditioned, en suite rooms, and free WiFi access. Each private room at Full Moon is equipped with a flat-screen smart TV. Each room has an en-suite bathroom. Several supermarkets and restaurants can be found within the immediate vicinity of the Full Moon Budapest. Shops on nearby streets offer countless opportunities for shopping. The Morrisons Music Pub 2 is located inside the same building. All guests benefit from free access to this music pub. The Jászai Mari tér Tram Stop is 200 metres away, where trams stop 24 hours a day (line 4 and 6). The hotel is 450 metres from the Margaret Island, 900 metres from the Parliament, 1.3 km from the St. Stephen's Basilica and 1.5 km from the Chain Bridge. The WestEnd City Center Shopping Centre is 900 metres away.

name: Ecostel Budaörs
description: Located in Budaörs, 10 km from Citadella, Ecostel Budaörs provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a shared lounge. The property is set 10 km from Gellért Hill, 10 km from Budapest History Museum and 10 km from Hungarian National Museum. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hostel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and bed linen. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Buda Castle is 10 km from Ecostel Budaörs, while Matthias Church is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Veritas
description: Hotel Veritas is located in 5-minute walk from the Puskás Ferenc Stadion metro station on M2 line. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. All rooms are fitted with a minibar and a safety box. The private bathroom comes with a shower and free toiletries. You can start your day with a buffet breakfast at Veritas Hotel. The front desk is at your service 24 hours a day. Garage and street-front parking is available for a surcharge and airport shuttle service is also provided on request. The Papp László SportArena and the Puskás Ferenc Stadion with sport events and concerts can be reached within a 5-minute walk. The centre of Budapest is 5 km away, easily accessible by public transport. The Keleti Pályaudvar international train station is 2 metro stops from the hotel.

name: Karpatia Vendeghaz 1201 Budapest
description: Set in Budapest, 7.3 km from Hungarian National Museum, Karpatia Vendeghaz 1201 Budapest offers air-conditioned rooms and a garden. The property is situated 8.3 km from Dohany Street Synagogue, 8.3 km from Gellért Hill and 8.5 km from Blaha Lujza Square. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the guest house, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station is 8.9 km from Karpatia Vendeghaz 1201 Budapest, while Keleti Railway Station is 9.2 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Esprit Hotel Budapest
description: Esprit Hotel is centrally located in Budapest, within 200 metres from the Blaha Lujza tér Underground Station (M2), and offers free WiFi. All rooms feature a bottle of mineral water upon arrival, a flat-screen cable TV, a desk, and a private bathroom with a shower. Hairdryers are available upon request. Various restaurants and grocery stores can be reached in less than 200 metres. Continental breakfast is offered at the Montenegroi Gurman restaurant, which is reachable in 2 minutes on foot. Esprit Hotel is 900 metres from the Keleti Railway Station and within 2.5 km from the Parliament, the Heroes' Square and the Chain Bridge. Parking is available nearby, at an extra charge. Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 16 km away and shuttle transfers can be organized.

name: Karma Boutique Apartments
description: The Karma Boutique Apartments are ideally situated on Liszt Ferenc square with its numerous restaurants and cafés, in the centre of Budapest. The square is right on Andrassy Avenue, the prime high-street shopping area. The Opera, the theatres and the public baths are within easy walking distance. All apartments feature a kitchen and included free wireless internet access. You enjoy excellent public transport connections when staying at the Karma Boutique Apartments, as Oktogon stop of the yellow metro line is only 50 metres away.

name: Katalin Panzió
description: Set in a lush residential district of Budapest, Katalin Panzió is surrounded by a garden with barbecue facilities. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are provided. All rooms come with a TV and a private, tiled bathroom with bathtub or shower. Horseback riding opportunities are 5 km away from the property, while the Campona Shopping Centre is 6 km away. Budapest's city centre is 14 km away.

name: Malomdulo Farmhaz
description: Surrounded by the Pilis Hills, the air-conditioned Malomdűlő Farmház is a 10-km drive from Budapest. It offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a garden with terrace and barbecue facilities. Farm animals such as goats, sheep and rabbits can be watched there. All units come with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a TV. The bright, pastel-coloured rooms have tiled floors and dark wooden beds. Continental breakfast is offered every morning. Fishing opportunities are only 200 metres away, and guests can go hiking in the surrounding hills. A bicycle track is right next to the Maloműlő. Egri Castle in Pilisborosjenő is 2 km away, while the Basilica in Esztergom is 30 km from the Farmház. Free private parking is available.

name: La Maison
description: Situated in Adyliget, 11 km from Matthias Church, La Maison features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is located 11 km from Trinity Square, 11 km from Fisherman's Bastion and 11 km from Budapest History Museum. The accommodation provides room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The motel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At La Maison rooms have bed linen and towels. An à la carte breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Buda Castle is 11 km from La Maison, while Chain Bridge is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 26 km from the motel.

name: Carpe Noctem Hostel
description: Set 300 metres from Nyugati Railway Station and the M3 metro station in Budapest, Carpe Noctem Hostel offers air conditioning and a common kitchen. Free Wi-Fi access is provided. Towels and linen are included in the rate, and the lodgings are bright and spacious. Laundry services are available at a surcharge. You can take advantage of the free book exchange and guide books on site. Several pubs, restaurants and bar can be found in the surroundings. Margit Island is reachable with a leisurely 20-minute walk away, while the Parliament is 900 metres from the property.

name: Sun Resort Apartments
description: Sun Resort Apartments is located in the new Corvin district of Budapest and offers a self-catering accommodation, luggage storage is available. The property is set just behind the Corvin Plaza Shopping Centre and next to a pedestrian street with restaurants and bars. All units in Sun Resort Apartments come with a private entrance, a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a shower and a bath tub. Most units also have a washing machine. All the apartments are air-conditioned. It comes with an additional cost. Breakfast is served in a restaurant 30 metres from the property for an additional charge. The nearest metro station is Klinikák on line M3, reachable within 500 metres, while the Grand Boulevard with the non-stop tram line 6 is at the distance of 700 metres. The Old Downtown is located 1.7 km away, and the Gellért Thermal Bath and the Hungarian National Theater are situated 2.4 km away.

name: Czakó Bed&Breakfast
description: No description found

name: M0 Caffe & Motel
description: Set on the outskirts of Nagytartcsa, M0 Caffe & Motel houses a café, a grill-bar and a petrol station as well as air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. The rooms feature modern furnishing, flat-screen TVs and bathrooms with shower. A breakfast can be served daily on site, while upon request guests can enjoy half-board option on à-la-carte basis from the grill specialties. M0 Caffe & Motel provides 24-hours front-desk at guests’ disposal. Budapest’s city centre can be reached within 13 km.

name: Hotel Bobbio
description: Situated in a quiet and exclusive residential area in the Buda Hills, the inviting little Bobbio hotel is a relaxing base during your stay in the impressive Hungarian capital. Take advantage of the proximity to the city centre and the lush green environment offering superb panoramic views. Tastefully renovated in 2006, the Bobbio hotel offers you nicely furnished and fully equipped rooms and apartments, where you can spend restful nights after a grand day out in Budapest. Every new day can be started with the hotel's rich buffet breakfast and the helpful and friendly staff is happy to provide you with any information you may need. The hotel's sauna is ideal for recharging your batteries after a day of sightseeing or doing business!

name: Tang house 唐舍
description: Situated in Budapest, within 9.4 km of Hungarian National Museum and 10 km of Dohany Street Synagogue, Tang house 唐舍 features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 10 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, 11 km from Blaha Lujza Square and 11 km from Keleti Railway Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 10 km from Gellért Hill. The units at the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen. All rooms have a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen. Hungarian State Opera is 11 km from Tang house 唐舍, while St. Stephen's Basilica is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.
